LCCN: n/a ISBN: n/a

Title: MNGON RTOGS RGYAN GYI 'GREL PA RNAM GNYIS KYI DKA' GNAS
GSAL BAR BYED PA LEGS BSHAD SKA

LA BZANG KLU DBANG GI ROL MTSO, (DGA' LDAN PAR MA,)

mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel pa rnam gnyis kyi dka' gnas gsal
bar byed pa

legs bshad skal bzang klu dbang gi rol mtsho/ (dga' ldan par
ma/)

Author: CHOS KYI BSHES GNYEN

chos kyi bshes gnyen

Descriptor: impression from blocks newly carved and preserved
at gaden parkhang

Original Publication: n/a;n/a

Place: dga' ldan/

Publisher: dga' ldan par khang/

Date: 1986

Volume: 2

Total Volumes: 2

TBRC Pages: 2

Introductory Pages: n/a

Text Pages: n/a

Scanning Information: Scanned at Tibetan Buddhist Resource
Center, 150 West 17th St, New York City, NY

10011, US. Comments: 12/2011 

@001A *, ,BSTAN BCOS MNGON PAR RTOGS PA'I RGYAN 'GREL PA DANG
BCAS PA'I RNAM BSHAD RNAM PA GNYIS KYI DKA' BA'I GNAD GSAR BAR
BYED PA? LEGS BSHAD SKAL BZANG KLU DBANG GI RONG? MTSO ZHES BYA
BA BAS SKABS GNYIS PA'I SPYI DON BZHUGS SO,,

@001B #, ,GNYIS PA THOB BYED LAM SHES KYI YAN LAG RGYAS PAR
BSHAD PA LA, 'BREL BKOD PAS MTSAMS SBYAR BA DANG, LAM SHES KYI
CHOS RGYAS PAR BSHAD

PA DANG, SKABS BSDU BA DANG GSUM LAS, DANG PO NI, LUS RNAM GZHAG
TU, RNAM KUN MKHYEN NYID LAM SHES NYID, ,CES 'CHAD NA, RNAM
MKHYEN GYI RJES SU LAM SHES

'CHAD PA'I RGYU MTSAN GANG ZHE NA, DE'I RGYU MTSAN YOD DE, THEG
PA GSUM GYI LAM RDZOGS PAR SGOM PA'I RGYU LAM SHES MA THOB PAR,
SKABS DANG POR BSTAN PA'I SEMS

BSKYED SOGS CHOS BCU MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA MTHAR PHYIN PA'I RNAM
MKHYEN THOB MI NUS PA'I RGYU MTSAN GYIS DE LTAR BSTAN PA'I
PHYIR, ZHES MTSAMS SBYOR BA LA, RNAM PA THAMS

@002A #, ,CAD MKHYEN PA NYID RTOGS PA NI LAM SHES PA NYID YONGS
SU SHES PA MED NA MED PAS LAM SHES PA NYID, CES GSUNGS, KHO NA
RE, SKABS GNYIS PA

'DIR LAM SHES STON MI DGOS TE, SKABS DANG POR BSTAN ZIN PA'I
PHYIR, SKABS DANG POR RAB DGA' LA SOGS PA'I SA BCU BSTAN PA'I
PHYIR, DPER NA, SKABS DANG POR BYANG

SEMS KYI LAM SHES PA'I LAM SHES KYI RGYU NGES 'BYED CHA MTHUN
BSTAN ZIN PA'I RGYU MTSAN GYIS DE SKABS GNYIS PAR MA BSHAD PA
BZHIN NO, ,RTAGS GRUB STE, 'GREL CHEN

LAS; MTHONG BA'I LAM DE'I NGES PAR 'BYED PA'I CHA DANG MTHUN PA
NI RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID DU BSHAD PA LAS BZUNG NGO,
,ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, ZHES DANG, DE

@002B LTAR YANG 'GREL CHEN LAS, GAL TE DE LTAR YIN NA RAB TU
DGA' BA LA SOGS PA'I SA RNAMS DER SMOS PA YIN PAS BYANG CHUB
SEMS DPA' RNAMS KYI MTHONG BA LA SOGS PA'I LAM BSTAN PA YIN PA'I
PHYIR, YANG CI'I PHYIR BSTAN CE NA,

ZHES GSUNGS, RTZOD PA DE'I SKYON MED DE, SKABS GNYIS PAR LAM
SHES BSTAN PA LA DGOS PA KHYAD PAR CAN YOD PA'I PHYIR TE, SKABS
DANG POR SEMS BSKYED SOGS MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA MTHAR PHYIN PA'I
YE SHES DE NYID DON DU GNYER BYA'I RNAM

MKHYEN DU BSTAN PA NA, DE LTA BU'I RNAM MKHYEN DES CHOS THAMS
CAD MNGON SUM DU GZIGS MOD, DE LTA BU'I RNAM MKHYEN DE THOB PA
LA GNAS LUGS KYI DON GCIG PU BSGOMS PA TZAM GYIS CHOG SNYAM PA
DANG, DKON MCHOG GSUM LA SKYABS

SU SONG BA TZAM GYIS 'THOB SNYAM PA DANG, 'KHOR BA LAS YID
'BYUNG ZHING SKYO SHES SKYED PA NI NYAN RANG RNAMS LA YOD KYI
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' RNAMS LA MA YIN TE, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'
RNAMS GZHAN DON DU 'KHOR BAR BZHUGS

DGOS PA'I PHYIR SNYAM PA'I LOG RTOG DE RNAMS BSAL NAS DE LTA
BU'I RNAM MKHYEN THOB PA LA THEG PA GSUM GYI LAM RDZOGS PAR SGOM
PA'I RGYU LAM SHES THOB PA SNGON DU 'GRO DGOS SO ZHES SHES PAR
BYA BA'I PHYIR DU CHOS BCU'I NANG NAS RGYU TZAM ZHIG

DRANGS NAS MTHONG SGOM GYI LAM GYIS BSDUS PA'I LAM SHES LOGS SU
BSHAD PA'I PHYIR, DE LTAR YANG, 'GREL CHEN LAS, BRJOD PAR BYA
STE RGYU DANG 'BRAS BU MA LUS PAR THUGS SU CHUD PA LA LTOS NAS
DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA RNAMS KYI RNAM PA

@003A *, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID CES BRJOD PA YIN PAS RGYAL
BA'I SRAS PO RNAMS KYI LAM NI DE LAS GSUNGS PA MIN NO, ,ZHES
DOGS PA BSAL BA'I PHYIR, DE NYID LA RGYU TZAM ZHIG DRANGS NAS
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' RNAMS

KYIS MTHONG BA LA SOGS PA'I LAM GYI BDAG NYID CAN LAM SHES PA
NYID LOGS SHIG TU BZHAG PA YIN NO, ,ZHES GSUNGS, DES NA GZHUNG
'DI'I SKABS SU MTHA' DPYAD PA LA, GZHAN LUGS DGAG PA DANG, RANG
LUGS GZHAG LA

GNYIS LAS, DANG PO LA, RONG t'IKA PA NA RE, LAM GSUM BDEN STONG
DU MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA'I YE SHES, LAM SHES KYI MTSAN NYID CES
ZER, DE 'GOG PA LA, RNAM BSHAD LAS, KHA CIG, ,LAM GSUM BDEN
STONG DU MNGON SUM DU RTOGS

PA'I YE SHES LAM SHES KYI MTSAN NYID DU 'DOD PA MI 'THAD DE,
NYAN THOS KYI LAM SHES PA'I LAM SHES KYIS MI RTAG SOGS BCU DRUG
MNGON SUM DU MA RTOGS PAR 'GYUR LA, DE LTA NA BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPAS SHES MTHONG GIS BLTAS

NAS 'DA' BAR BYA BA'I MNGON RTOGS THEG PA CHEN PO'I MTHONG LAM
GYI DUS NA BSKYED PA MI RIGS PAR THAL BA DANG, NYAN THOS KYI
RIGS CAN RJES SU GZUNG BA'I CHED DU LAM SHES GSUM GYI DANG PO
SGOM PA MA YIN PAR THAL BA DANG, MI RTAG

SOGS MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA DE NYID KYIS SPROS BRAL MNGON SUM DU
RTOGS PA YIN NA NI, SLOB LAM NA BDEN GNYIS NGO BO THA DAD DU
'DZIN PA'I DRI MA ZAD PAR SPANGS PA YOD PAR THAL BA DANG, MNYAM
RJES NGO BO GCIG TU YOD PAR THAL PA SOGS SO,,

@003B GZHAN YANG LAM SHES LA ZHI BA'I MTHA' 'GOG PA'I SNYING RJE
CHEN PO LAM SHES KYIS BSDUS PA MED PAR THAL BA DANG, BYANG CHUB
SEMS DPA'I THUGS RGYUD KYI DMIGS PA MED PA'I SNYING RJES KYANG
STONG NYID MNGON SUM DU MA RTOGS NA LAM SHES LA

DES KHYAB PAR 'DOD PA NI MI RIGS PA KHO NA'O, ,ZHES GSUNGS, DON
NI, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I RGYUD KYI NYAN THOS KYI LAM SHES PA'I
LAM SHES CHOS CAN, MTSAN NYID DER THAL, LAM SHES YIN PA'I PHYIR
TE, THEG CHEN 'PHAGS PA'I

MKHYEN PA YIN PA'I PHYIR, 'DOD NA, DE CHOS CAN, MI RTAG SOGS BCU
DRUG MNGON SUM DU MA RTOGS PAR THAL, LAM GSUM BDEN STONG DU
MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA'I SLOB PA'I RGYUD KYI MKHYEN PA YIN PA'I
PHYIR, GZHAN YANG, BYANG SEMS MTHONG LAM

PA'I RGYUD LA 'DA' BYA'I MTHONG LAM GCIG MED PAR THAL, DE'I
RGYUD LA NYAN THOS KYI RTOGS RIGS SU GNAS PA'I MKHYEN PA MED
PA'I PHYIR, DE'I RGYUD KYI MKHYEN PA YIN NA, STONG NYID MNGON
SUM DU RTOGS PA'I MKHYEN PA YIN DGOS PA'I PHYIR,

GZHAN YANG SLOB LAM NA BLO GCIG GIS BDEN GNYIS CIG CHAR DU DNGOS
SU MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA GCIG YOD PAR THAL, MI RTAG SOGS BCU
DRUG MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA'I THEG CHEN GYI MTHONG LAM DES STONG
NYID MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA'I PHYIR,

RTAGS KHAS, 'DOD NA, SLOB LAM NA BDEN GNYIS NGO BO THA DAD DU
'DZIN PA'I DRI MA ZAD PAR SPANGS PA YOD PAR THAL LO, ,GZHAN
YANG, BYANG SEMS 'PHAGS PA'I RGYUD KYI SNYING RJE CHEN PO CHOS
CAN, MTSAN NYID DER THAL, LAM SHES YIN PA'I

@004A *, ,PHYIR; 'DOD NA, DE CHOS CAN, SHES RAB KHYAD PAR CAN
GYI RTOGS RIGS SU GNAS PAR THAL, SLOB PA'I RGYUD KYI STONG NYID
MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA'I MKHYEN PA YIN PA'I PHYIR, 'DOD MI NUS
TE, THABS KHYAD PAR CAN GYI RTOGS

RIGS SU GNAS PA'I PHYIR TE, SNYING RJES ZHI LA MI GNAS PA'I LAM
SHES YIN PA'I PHYIR, MA GRUB NA, SNYING RJES ZHI LA MI GNAS PA'I
LAM SHES GCIG MED PAR THAL LO, ,GZHAN YANG, DE CHOS CAN, LAM
GSUM BDEN PAR 'DZIN PA'I

BDEN 'DZIN DANG 'DZIN STANGS DNGOS SU 'GAL BA'I BLO YIN PAR
THAL, LAM GSUM BDEN STONG DU MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA'I YE SHES YIN
PA'I PHYIR, 'DOD MI NUS TE, SLOB PA'I RGYUD KYI SNYING RJE YIN
PA'I PHYIR, KHYAB STE, RNAM 'GREL LAS,

BYAMS SOGS RMONGS DANG 'GAL MED PHYIR, ,SHIN TU NYES PA TSAR
GCOD MIN, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, KHA CIG ,RNAM BSHAD LAS, SLOB
LAM NA MNYAM RJES NGO BO GCIG TU YOD PAR THAL BA DANG, ZHES
GSUNGS PA'I DON, BYANG 'PHAGS KYI

RGYUD KYI MI RTAG SOGS BCU DRUG MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA'I YE SHES
DE RJES THOB YE SHES YIN PA'I DON YIN ZHES GSUNGS PA MI 'THAD
DE, RANG YUL DU GYUR PA'I KUN RDZOB BDEN PA MNGON SUM DU RTOGS
PA'I YE SHES YIN NA, RJES THOB YE SHES

YIN PAS KHYAB PAR THAL BA DANG, KUN RDZOB DNGOS YUL DU BYED PA'I
SEMS DPA'I RNAL 'BYOR YIN NA, RJES THOB YE SHES YIN DGOS PAR
THAL BA'I SKYON YOD PA'I PHYIR, KHO NA RE, BYANG SEMS MTHONG LAM
PA'I RGYUD KYI MI RTAG SOGS BCU DRUG

@004B MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA'I YE SHES DE RJES THOB YE SHES YIN
PAR THAL, THEG CHEN MTHONG LAM LA MNYAM RJES GNYIS SU GRANGS
NGES PA'I PHYIR TE, DE LA KUN RDZOB DNGOS YUL DU BYED PA'I DE
DANG DON DAM DNGOS YUL DU BYED PA'I DE GNYIS SU GRANGS NGES

PA'I PHYIR NA MA KHYAB STE, THEG CHEN MTHONG LAM BAR CHAD MED
LAM PA'I RGYUD KYI GANG ZAG GI BDAG MED MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA'I
MKHYEN PA DE RJES THOB YE SHES YIN PAR THAL, DE YOD PA GANG ZHIG
,DAM BCA' 'THAD PA'I PHYIR, 'DOD NA, DE'I RGYUD LA

RJES THOB YE SHES YOD PAR THAL LO, ,'DOD NA, DE RJES THOB LA
GNAS PA'I SEMS DPA' YIN PAR THAL LO, ,'DOD NA, RJES THOB LA GNAS
PA'I SEMS DPA'I RGYUD KYI STONG NYID MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA'I
MKHYEN PA DE MNYAM GZHAG YE SHES YIN PAR THAL

LO; ;KHO NA RE, THEG CHEN MTHONG LAM RJES THOB YE SHES YIN NA,
RANG GI NYER LEN DU GYUR PA'I THEG CHEN GYI MTHONG LAM MNYAM
GZHAG YE SHES LAS BYUNG BAS KHYAB PAR THAL, THEG CHEN MTHONG LAM
BAR CHAD MED LAM PA'I RGYUD KYI GANG ZAG GI

BDAG MED MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA'I MKHYEN PA DE RJES THOB YE SHES
MA YIN PA'I PHYIR, 'DOD NA, RJES THOB YE SHES YIN NA, RANG GI
NYER LEN DU GYUR PA'I MNYAM GZHAG YE SHES LAS BYUNG BAS KHYAB
PAR THAL, 'DOD PA'I PHYIR NA MA KHYAB, 'DOD NA,

DMAN LAM SNGON DU MA SONG BA'I TSOGS LAM SKAD CIG DANG PO LA
GNAS PA'I SEMS DPA'I RGYUD KYI KUN RDZOB SEMS BSKYED CHOS CAN,
DER THAL, DE'I PHYIR, KUN RDZOB SEMS BSKYED MNGON GYUR PA YIN
PA'I PHYIR, CHOS CAN DE YIN PA'I PHYIR, KHA CIG ,

@005A *, ,SLOB LAM NA BLO GCIG GIS BDEN GNYIS CIG CHAR DU DNGOS
SU RTOGS PA MED ZER BA MI 'THAD DE, DMAN LAM SNGON DU MA SONG
BA'I BYANG SEMS SBYOR LAM PA'I RGYUD KYI CHOS NYID LA RTZE GCIG
TU MNYAM PAR BZHAG PA'I MNYAM GZHAG

YE SHES DES STONG NYID DANG STONG NYID KYI DON SPYI GNYIS KA CIG
CHAR DU DNGOS SU RTOGS PA'I PHYIR, KHA CIG ,THEG CHEN 'PHAGS
PA'I RGYUD KYI GANG ZAG GI BDAG MED MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA'I
MKHYEN PA YIN NA, MNYAM RJES GNYIS KA YIN PAS KHYAB

ZER BA DANG, YANG KHA CIG ,DE YIN NA MNYAM GZHAG YE SHES MA YIN
PAS KHYAB ZER NA, DANG PO MI 'THAD DE, THEG CHEN MTHONG LAM BAR
CHAD MED LAM PA'I RGYUD KYI GANG ZAG GI BDAG MED MNGON SUM DU
RTOGS PA'I MKHYEN PA DE MNYAM RJES GANG YANG

MA YIN PA'I PHYIR, GNYIS PA MI 'THAD DE, THEG CHEN 'PHAGS PA'I
RGYUD KYI GANG ZAG GI BDAG MED MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA'I MKHYEN PA
YIN NA, MNYAM GZHAG YE SHES MA YIN DGOS PAR THAL, DAM BCA' 'THAD
PA'I PHYIR, 'DOD NA, RNAM MKHYEN CHOS

CAN; DER THAL, DE'I PHYIR, GZHAN YANG, NYAN THOS 'PHAGS PA'I
RGYUD KYI STONG NYID LA RTZE GCIG TU MNYAM PAR BZHAG PA'I MNYAM
GZHAG YE SHES DE MNYAM GZHAG YE SHES MA YIN PAR THAL, BYANG SEMS
'PHAGS PA'I RGYUD KYI GANG ZAG GI BDAG MED

LA RTZE GCIG TU MNYAM PAR BZHAG PA'I YE SHES DE MNYAM GZHAG YE
SHES MA YIN PA'I PHYIR, YANG KHA CIG ,NYAN THOS DGRA BCOM PA'I
RTOGS PA SNGON DU SONG BA'I BYANG SEMS KYI TSOGS LAM DE LAM SHES
YIN ZER BA MI 'THAD DE, LAM SHES YIN NA,

@005B RANG GI NYER LEN DU GYUR PA'I THEG CHEN GYI SBYOR LAM LAS
BYUNG BAS KHYAB PA'I PHYIR, NYAN THOS KYI LAM SHES PA'I LAM SHES
LA YANG DES KHYAB, RANG RGYAL GYI LAM SHES PA'I LAM SHES LA YANG
DES KHYAB PA'I PHYIR, DANG PO GRUB STE, BDEN PA BZHI YONGS SU

SHES PA NI NGES PAR 'BYED PA'I CHA DANG MTHUN PA RTOGS PA SNGON
DU 'GRO BA YIN PAS, LAM BRJOD NAS NGES PAR 'BYED PA'I CHA DANG
MTHUN PA, ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, GNYIS PA GRUB STE, NGES PAR
'BYED PA'I CHA DANG MTHUN PA THOB NA JI SKAD BSHAD PA'I LAM SKYE

BAS; ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, YANG KHA CIG ,LAM SHES KYI RGYU NGO
BO 'BRAS BU GSUM PO GANG RUNG GIS BSDUS PA'I SEMS DPA'I YON TAN,
LAM SHES KYI YAN LAG GI MTSAN NYID DU 'DOD PA MI 'THAD DE, SANGS
RGYAS KYIS NA LAM SHES KYI YAN LAG

YOD PA GANG ZHIG ,LAM MA ZHUGS NA YANG DE YOD PA'I PHYIR, DANG
PO GRUB STE, DE NA YAN LAG CAN GYI LAM SHES YOD PA'I PHYIR,
GNYIS PA GRUB STE, RGYU THEG CHEN DU RIGS SAD PA DE LAM SHES KYI
YAN LAG YIN PA'I PHYIR TE, KHYAB PA DANG, ,ZHES GSUNGS

PA'I PHYIR, KHO NA RE, LAM SHES KYI RANG BZHIN DE LAM SHES KYI
YAN LAG TU THAL, THEG CHEN DU RIGS SAD PA DE DE YIN PA'I PHYIR,
'DOD NA, LAM SHES KYI NGO BO DE DE YIN PAR THAL, 'DOD PA'I
PHYIR, 'DOD NA, LAM SHES DE DE YIN PAR THAL, 'DOD

PA'I PHYIR NA MA KHYAB, 'DOD NA, DE CHOS CAN, KHYOD KHYOD KYI
YAN LAG MA YIN PAR THAL, KHYOD BDAG MED YIN PA'I PHYIR, ZHES ZER
BA DANG, LAM SHES RDZOGS BYED KYI CHA SHAS SU GYUR PA'I SEMS
DPA'I YON TAN DE, 'DIR BSTAN LAM SHES KYI YAN

@006A *, ,LAG GI MTSAN NYID ZER BA NANG 'GAL TE, 'DIR BSTAN LAM
SHES YIN NA, MTSAN NYID DE YIN DGOS PAR THAL, 'DIR BSTAN LAM
SHES KYI YAN LAG 'DI? DGOS PA'I PHYIR, 'DOD NA, 'DIR BSTAN LAM
SHES CHOS CAN,

DER THAL, DE'I PHYIR, 'DOD NA, DE CHOS CAN, 'DIR BSTAN LAM SHES
KYI YAN LAG TU THAL, MTSAN NYID DE'I PHYIR, 'DOD NA, DE CHOS
CAN, KHYOD KHYOD KYI YAN LAG MA YIN PAR THAL, KHYOD BDAG MED YIN
PA'I PHYIR, KHYAB PA KHAS, GZHAN YANG,

'PHAGS LAM CHOS CAN, KHYOD KHYOD KYI YAN LAG MA YIN PAR THAL,
KHYOD BDAG MED YIN PA'I PHYIR, KHYAB PA KHAS, 'DOD MI NUS TE,
'PHAGS LAM YAN LAG YIN PA'I PHYIR, KHYAB STE, BYANG CHUB YAN LAG
YIN NA, BYANG CHUB KYI YAN LAG

YIN DGOS PA'I PHYIR, GNYIS PA RANG LUGS LA, LAM SHES KYI YAN LAG
BSHAD PA DANG, YAN LAG CAN GYI LAM SHES BSHAD PA GNYIS LAS, DANG
PO LA, MTSAN NYID, DBYE BA, SA MTSAMS GSUM LAS, DANG PO NI, LAM
SHES KYI RGYU NGO BO

'BRAS BU GSUM PO GANG RUNG GIS BSDUS SHING SNYING RJE CHEN POS
ZIN PA'I YON TAN KHYAD PAR CAN, LAM SHES KYI YAN LAG GI MTSAN
NYID, GNYIS PA LA LNGA LAS, BGEGS PA RGYAL MNGON GYUR PA DANG
BRAL BA, LHAN CIG BYED RKYEN BYANG CHUB MCHOG TU

SEMS BSKYED PA, RGYU THEG PA CHEN POR RIGS SAD PA, RANG BZHIN
NYON MONGS SPANG BYA'I GTZO BOR BYAS NAS MI SPONG BA, BYED LAS
SEMS CAN SMIN PAR BYED PA SOGS LA MKHAS PA RNAMS SU YOD PA'I
PHYIR, GSUM PA NI, THEG CHEN DU RIGS SAD PA

@006B NAS SANGS RGYAS KYI SA'I BAR DU YOD, GNYIS PA LA GSUM LAS,
DANG PO NI, RANG RGYUD LDAN GYI GANG ZAG GI RGYUD KYI STONG NYID
MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA'I SHES RAB KYIS ZIN PA'I THEG CHEN 'PHAGS
PA'I MKHYEN PA DE LAM SHES KYI MTSAN NYID, GNYIS PA NI,

DE LA NYAN THOS KYI LAM SHES PA'I LAM SHES, RANG RGYAL GYI LAM
SHES PA'I LAM SHES, BYANG SEMS KYI LAM SHES PA'I LAM SHES GSUM
DU YOD DE, DE RE RE LA'ANG RGYU LAM SHES DANG 'BRAS BU LAM SHES
GNYIS GNYIS SU YOD, GSUM PA SA MTSAMS

THEG CHEN MTHONG LAM NAS SANGS RGYAS KYI SA'I BAR DU YOD DO, `
,GNYIS PA LAM SHES MTSON BYED KYI CHOS RGYAS PAR 'CHAD PA LA, 'O
NA, SKABS GNYIS PA 'DIR LAM SHES MTSON BYED KYI CHOS BCU GCIG GI
SGO NAS RGYAS PAR 'CHAD NA,

'CHAD TSUL DE GANG ZHE NA, 'DI LA YANG LAM SHES KYI YAN LAG
DANG, YAN LAG CAN GYI LAM SHES GNYIS LAS, DANG PO LA, MDO LAS
GSUNGS TSUL DANG, BSTAN BCOS KYIS 'GREL TSUL GNYIS LAS, DANG PO
NI, 'DI YAN CHAD KYI RAB 'BYOR GYI LE'U LAS

RNAM MKHYEN BSHAD ZIN PA DANG, DE'I TSE YANG STONG GSUM GYI
STONG CHEN PO'I 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS 'DI NA RGYAL PO CHEN PO JI
SNYED CIG YOD PA DE DAG THAMS CAD KYANG, LHA'I BU STONG PHRAG DU
MA DANG LHAN CIG 'KHOR DE NYID DU 'DUS PAR GYUR TO, ,DE BZHIN DU
LHA RNAMS

KYI DBANG PO BRGYA BYIN RNAMS DANG, MTHA' BRAL PA RNAMS DANG,
DGA' LDAN PA RNAMS DANG, 'PHRUL DGA' BA RNAMS DANG, GZHAN 'PHRUL
DBANG BYED PA RNAMS DANG, TSANGS 'KHOR NAS TSANGS PA CHEN PO
RNAMS KYI BAR DANG, GZHAN YANG, STONG GSUM GYI

@007A *, ,STONG CHEN PO'I 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS 'DI NA, 'OD CHUNG
NAS GNAS GTZANG MA'I RIS KYI LHA RNAMS KYI BAR KYI LHA'I BU BYE
BA KHRAG KHRIG BRGYA STONG DU MA DANG LHAN CIG TU 'KHOR DE NYID
DU 'DUS PAR GYUR TE, ZHES SOGS GSUNGS, GNYIS PA LA

RTZA 'GREL GNYIS LAS, DANG PO NI, MDO DE'I DON 'CHAD PA LA, LHA
RNAMS RUNG BAR BYA BA'I PHYIR, ,ZHES SOGS GSUNGS, DE NYID TSIG
DON GYI SGO NAS 'CHAD PA LA, LAM SHES PA NYID SKYE BAR RUNG BA
NYID DU BSGRUB PA'I PHYIR, ZHES SOGS GSUNGS

RTZA 'GREL 'DI RNAMS KYI DON BSDU NA YANG, LAM SHES KYI RTEN
DANG, BRTEN PA LAM SHES KYI KHYAD PAR GNYIS LAS, DANG PO NI,
RGYAL CHEN BZHI'I RIS KYI LHA RNAMS KYI LAS KYI RNAM PAR SMIN PA
LAS BYUNG BA'I 'OD GANG YIN PA DANG, ZHES

PA NAS, DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I RANG BZHIN GYI 'OD KYI DRUNG NA LHA
RNAMS KYI RNAM PAR SMIN PA LAS SKYES PA'I 'OD DE NI LHAM ME MA
YIN, LHAN NE MA YIN, LHANG NGER MA YIN GYI DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I
'OD 'BA' ZHIG RAB CES BYA'O, ,GTZO BO ZHES

BYA'O; ;BLA NA MED PA DANG GONG NA MED PA DANG GONG MA'I YANG
GONG MA ZHES BYA'O, ,ZHES DANG, DE NAS LHA RNAMS KYI DBANG PO
BRGYA BYIN GYIS TSE DANG LDAN PA RAB 'BYOR LA 'DI SKAD CES SMRAS
SO, ,BTZUN PA RAB 'BYOR STONG GSUM GYI STONG CHEN PO'I

'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS NA, RGYAL CHEN BZHI'I RIS KYI LHA RNAMS
DANG, SUM CU RTZA GSUM PA RNAMS DANG, MTHA' BRAL PA RNAMS DANG,
DGA' LDAN PA RNAMS DANG, 'PHRUL DGA' BA RNAMS DANG, GZHAN 'PHRUL
DBANG BYED KYI LHA RNAMS NAS

@007B GNAS GTZANG MA'I RIS KYI LHA RNAMS KYI BAR GYI LHA'I BU
GANG JI SNYED PA DE DAG THAMS CAD TSE DANG LDAN PA RAB 'BYOR
GYIS SHER PHYIN RGYAS PAR BSTAN PA THOS PAR 'DOD NAS, SHER PHYIN
NYE BAR BSTAN PA NYAN PA'I PHYIR LHAGS NA, BTZUN PA RAB

'BYOR JI LTAR BYANG CHEN SHER PHYIN LA GNAS PAR BYA, BYANG CHEN
SHER PHYIN GANG YIN ZHES BYA BAS BSTAN, DE YANG MDO TSAN DANG PO
DES, DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I 'OD KYIS 'DOD GZUGS KYI LHA RNAMS KYI
'OD MOG MOG PO STE GZI MED PAR

MDZAD PAR BSTAN NAS, MDO TSAN GNYIS PAS, 'DOD GZUGS KYI LHA
RNAMS KYI RGYUD LA LAM SHES DNGOS DANG BRGYUD NAS SKYE BA'I SNOD
RUNG DU BYAS PAR BSTAN PA YIN TE, GONG DU 'OD ZIL GYIS MNAN PA
NA NGA RGYAL BCAGS TE, MTHU KHYAD PAR

CAN DE LA DAD NAS SANGS RGYAS THOB PHYIR DU SEMS BSKYED LA, DE
LA BRTEN NAS 'DOD PA'I LHA 'GA' ZHIG LAM SHES DNGOS SU DANG,
GZUGS KYI LHA RNAMS LAM SHES BRGYUD NAS SKYE BA'I SNOD RUNG DU
GYUR PA'I PHYIR, DE'I DON 'CHAD PA LA, LHA RNAMS RUNG

BAR BYA BA'I PHYIR, ,'OD KYIS MOG MOG POR MDZAD DANG, ,ZHES
DANG, LAM SHES PA NYID SKYE RUNG BA NYID DU BSGRUB PA'I PHYIR,
DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I RANG BZHIN GYI 'OD DAG GIS LHA LA SOGS PA'I
RNAM PAR SMIN PA'I 'OD MOG MOG POR MDZAD PA NI NGA RGYAL BCOM

PA'I RGYUD KHO NA LA RTOGS PA SKYE'O ZHES BYA BAR SHES PAR BYA
BA'I PHYIR MDZAD DE, DE'I PHYIR TSIG ZUR GYIS RTEN BRJOD PA YIN
NO, ,ZHES GSUNGS, DON NI DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I RANG BZHIN GYI 'OD
KYIS 'DOD GZUGS KYI LHA RNAMS KYI 'OD MOG MOG POR MDZAD PA

@008A *, ,CHOS CAN, DGOS PA YOD DE, DE RNAMS THEG CHEN SEMS
BSKYED DANG LAM SHES BRGYUD NAS SKYE BA'I SNOD RUNG DU BSGRUB
PAR BYA BA'I CHED YIN PA'I PHYIR, LAM SHES SKYE BA'I RTEN DE LA
BGEGS NGA RGYAL MNGON GYUR PA DANG BRAL BA GCIG

DGOS TE, DE DANG MA BRAL BAR LAM SHES SKYE MI RUNG BA'I PHYIR, `
GNYIS PA BRTEN PA LAM SHES KYI KHYAD PAR LA, SKYE TSUL DANG, NGO
BO DANG, BYED LAS KYI KHYAD PAR GSUM LAS, DANG PO LA, GNAS SKABS
KYI SKYE TSUL GYI KHYAD PAR DANG, MTHAR THUG

GI SKYE TSUL GYI KHYAD PAR GNYIS LAS, DANG PO DE STON PA LA, 'O
NA, LAM SHES SKYE BA LA BGEGS NGA RGYAL MNGON GYUR PA DANG BRAL
BA DE TZAM GYIS CHOG GAM ZHE NA DES MI CHOG STE, DE LA MTHUN
RKYEN BYANG CHUB MCHOG TU SEMS BSKYED PA GCIG DGOS PA'I

PHYIR; ZHES 'CHAD PA LA, MDO LAS, DE SKAD CES SMRAS PA DANG, TSE
DANG LDAN PA RAB 'BYOR GYIS LHA RNAMS KYI DBANG PO BRGYA BYIN LA
'DI SKAD CES SMRAS SO, ,KO'U SHI KA DE'I PHYIR SANGS RGYAS KYI
MTHU DANG SANGS RGYAS KYI BYIN GYIS BRLABS KYIS BYANG CHEN

RNAMS KYI SHER PHYIN DANG, BYANG CHEN SHER PHYIN LA JI LTAR GNAS
PAR BYA BA NYE BAR BSTAN TE, LHA'I BU GANG DAG GIS BLA NA MED PA
YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I BYANG CHUB TU SEMS MA BSKYED PA DE DAG
GIS KYANG BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I BYANG

CHUB TU SEMS BSKYED PAR BYA'O, ,GANG YANG DAG PAR SKYON MED PA
LA ZHUGS PA DE DAG LA NI BLA MED RDZOGS BYANG DU SEMS BSKYED
PA'I MTHU MED DO, ,DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, DE DAG GIS 'KHOR BA'I
RGYUN GYI MTSAMS BCAD PA'I PHYIR RO, ,ZHES GSUNGS, DE'I DON

@008B 'CHAD PA LA, YUL NGES PA DANG, ZHES DANG, DE YANG BYANG
CHUB TU SEMS BSKYED PA KHO NA YIN PAS YUL SO SOR NGES PA YIN NO,
,ZHES GSUNGS, DE'I DON NI, LAM SHES SKYE BA'I RTEN GYI YUL SO
SOR NGES PA YIN TE, DE DNGOS SU SKYE BA'I RTEN GYI GANG

ZAG YIN NA, BYANG CHUB MCHOG TU SEMS BSKYED PA'I GANG ZAG YIN
DGOS PA'I PHYIR, KHO NA RE, LAM SHES DE KHAMS GSUM GANG RUNG GI
RTEN LA DNGOS SU MI SKYE BAR THAL, DE 'DOD PA'I RTEN LA DNGOS SU
MI SKYE BA'I PHYIR, MA GRUB NA, 'DOD KHAMS PA'I GANG

ZAG DE LAM SHES DNGOS SU SKYE BA'I RTEN GYI GANG ZAG TU THAL,
'DOD PA'I PHYIR NA MA KHYAB, KHA CIG ,LAM SHES CHOS CAN, KHYOD
DNGOS SU GSAR DU SKYE BA'I RTEN GYI YUL SO SOR NGES PA YIN TE,
KHYOD BYANG CHUB MCHOG TU SEMS BSKYED PA'I GANG ZAG KHO NA'I
RGYUD

LA DNGOS SU GSAR DU SKYE BA'I PHYIR ZER NA, SANGS RGYAS 'PHAGS
PA'I RGYUD LA RNAM MKHYEN DNGOS SU GSAR DU SKYE BAR THAL, RNAM
MKHYEN RGYUD LDAN GYI GANG ZAG YIN NA, RANG RGYUD LA RNAM MKHYEN
DNGOS SU GSAR DU MI SKYE BAS MA KHYAB PA'I PHYIR, LAM SHES

RGYUD LDAN LA DE'I PHYIR, MA GRUB NA, BYANG CHUB MCHOG TU SEMS
BSKYED PA'I GANG ZAG CHOS CAN, DER THAL, DE'I PHYIR, KHYOD GANG
ZAG GANG ZHIG ,LAM SHES KHYOD KYI RGYUD LA YOD PA'I PHYIR, MA
GRUB NA, DE CHOS CAN, KHYOD BYANG CHUB MCHOG TU SEMS BSKYED

PA'I GANG ZAG GI RGYUD LA YOD PAR THAL, KHYOD BYANG SEMS 'PHAGS
PA'I RGYUD LA YOD PA'I PHYIR, ZHES GSUNGS, DES NA GANG YANG DAG
PA'I SKYON MED PA LA ZHUGS PA NI, NYAN THOS KYI MTHONG LAM THOB
PA'I LAM THAMS CAD LA ZHUGS PA DANG, MTSAMS

@009A *, ,BCAD PA NI, NYON MONGS MA LUS PAR SPANGS PAS 'KHOR BAR
SKYE BA'I RGYU LOG PA LA BYED PA YIN TE, DE LTAR DU RGYAN SNANG
LAS GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, ` GNYIS PA MTHAR THUG GI SKYE TSUL GYI
KHYAD PAR STON PA LA, 'O NA, BYANG

CHUB SEMS DPA' LAS GZHAN PA'I RGYUD LA LAM SHES GTAN MI SKYE BA
YIN NAM ZHE NA MIN TE, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI RGYUD LA LAM SHES
SKYE BA'I PHYIR, DE DAG GI RGYUD LA SANGS RGYAS KYI RIGS KYIS
KHYAB PA'I PHYIR, ZHES RGYU RIGS KYI KHYAD PAR STON PA LA, MDO

LAS; 'ON KYANG GAL TE DE DAG GIS BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG PAR
RDZOGS PA'I BYANG CHUB TU SEMS BSKYED NA DE DAG LA RJES SU YI
RANG BAR BYA'O, ,ZHES GSUNGS, DE'I DON 'CHAD PA LA, KHYAB PA
DANG, ,ZHES DANG, THEG PA GSUM RNAM PAR BZHAG PA NI

DGONGS PA CAN YIN GYI MTSAN NYID PA MA YIN NO, ,ZHES LUGS LAS
BYUNG BAS SKYE BO THAMS CAD BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS
PA'I BYANG CHUB KYI MTHAR THUG PA CAN YIN TE, DE'I PHYIR 'DOD
CHAGS DANG BRAL BA DANG CIG SHOS KYI RNAL 'BYOR PAS KYANG SANGS

RGYAS NYID THOB PAR BYA BA'I PHYIR LAM SHES PA NYID BSGOM PAR
BYA BA YIN PAS KHYAB PA YIN NO, ,ZHES GSUNGS, 'DI'I SKABS SU,
SPYI DON DANG, GZHUNG DON GNYIS LAS, DANG PO LA, MTHAR THUG THEG
PA GSUM DU GSUNGS PA LA DRANG NGES SU 'DOD TSUL, NYAN RANG

THEG CHEN LAM DU GANG NAS 'JUG PA, 'KHOR BA LA MTHA' YOD MED
DPYAD PA DANG GSUM LAS, DANG PO LA YANG, DE LTAR GSUNGS PA NGES

@009B DANG PO LA, MDO GANG GI RJES SU 'BRANG BA DANG, DE'I DON
JI LTAR BSHAD PA GNYIS LAS, DANG PO NI, MDO SDE DGONGS 'GREL

SANGS RGYAS THAMS CAD BRTZON PA DANG LDAN PAR GYUR KYANG BYANG

CHUB KYI SNYING PO LA BZHAG STE, BLA MED RDZOGS BYANG THOB PAR
BYAR MI NUS SO, ,DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, 'DI LTAR DE NI SNYING RJE
SHIN TU CHUNG BA DANG, SDUG BSNGAL GYIS SHIN TU 'JIGS PA'I PHYIR
DANG, RANG BZHIN GYI RIGS DMAN PA KHO NA YIN PA'I PHYIR RO,
,ZHES DANG,

NYAN THOS BYANG CHUB TU YONGS SU GYUR PA GANG YIN PA DE NI, NGAS
RNAM GRANGS KYI BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' YIN PAR BSTAN TE, 'DI LTAR
DE NI NYON MONGS PA'I SGRIB PA LAS RNAM PAR GROL NAS DE BZHIN
GSHEGS PA RNAMS KYIS SDUG BSNGAL NAS SHES

BYA'I SGRIB PA LAS SEMS SHIN TU RNAM PAR GROL BAR BYED PA'I
PHYIR, ZHES MDO DE LAS ZHI BA BGROD PA DANG YONGS SU GYUR PA
GNYIS THEG CHEN LAS LDOG MI SRID PA DANG, LDOG SRID PAR GSUNGS
PA RNAMS KYI RJES SU 'BRANG NAS 'CHAD DO, ,GNYIS PA LA, RANG
LUGS

GZHAG PA DANG, DE LA NANG 'GAL SPANG PA DANG, MDO GZHAN DANG
'GAL BA SPANG BA DANG GSUM LAS, DANG PO NI, SEMS TZAM PA RNAMS
NA RE, MTHAR THUG THEG PA GSUM DU GRUB PAR GSUNGS PA SGRA JI
BZHIN PA YIN TE, MTHAR THUG THEG PA GSUM DU GRUB

PA'I PHYIR TE, DE LTAR LUNG GIS KYANG GRUB, RIGS PAS KYANG GRUB
PA'I PHYIR, DANG PO GRUB STE, DGONGS 'GREL LAS SNGAR BZHIN
GSUNGS PA DANG, LANG GSHEGS LAS RIGS SNGAR GSUNGS PA DANG, BLO
GROS MI ZAD PAR BSTAN PA LAS KYANG, GSUM

@010A *, ,PO 'DI DAG NI NGES PAR 'BYIN PAR BYED PA'I THEG PA YIN
NO, ,'DI LTA STE, NYAN THOS KYI THEG PA DANG, RANG SANGS RGYAS
KYI THEG PA DANG, THEG PA CHEN PO'O, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA DANG, KHAMS
SNA TSOGS PA'I MDO LAS,

SEMS CAN RNAMS KHAMS SNA TSOGS PAR GSUNGS PA DANG, DE BZHIN DU
MDO SDE DU MA LAS THEG PA GSUM SO SOR GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, GNYIS
PA GRUB STE SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI RGYUD KYI THEG PA SO SO'I LAM
DU DKRIR RUNG BA'I ZAG MED

GZHAN DBANG DANG YONGS GRUB BDEN PAR GRUB PA'I PHYIR DANG, RIGS
CHAD KYI SEMS CAN YANG YOD PA'I PHYIR DANG, LHAG MED MYANG 'DAS
LA GNAS PA'I DGRA BCOM PA YANG SRID DU SKYE BA

LEN PA MED PA'I PHYIR TE, LHAG MED MYANG 'DAS KYI TSE RIG PA
RGYUN CHAD PA'I PHYIR TE, DE LTAR YANG, BSDU BA LAS, NYAN THOS
BYANG CHUB TU YONGS SU GYUR PA CI PHUNG PO LHAG MA DANG BCAS
PA'I MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS PA'I DBYINGS LA GNAS SHING BLA NA

LA GNAS SHING BYED CE NA, SMRAS PA PHUNG PO'I LHAG MA DANG BCAS
PA'I MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS PA'I DBYINGS LA GNAS

@010B DE; RDZU 'PHRUL GYI MTHUS TSE BSRINGS NAS BYANG CHUB

THUG THEG PA

@013B THEG DANG TSANGS PA'I THEG, DE BZHIN DU NI NYAN THOS

NGO; ;GNYIS PA MTHAR THUG THEG PA GSUM DU GSUNGS PA SGRA JI
BZHIN PA MA YIN TE, MTHAR THUG THEG PA GCIG TU GRUB PA'I PHYIR
TE, DE LTAR LUNG GIS KYANG GRUB, RIGS PAS KYANG GRUB PA'I
PHYIR, DANG PO GRUB STE, LANG GSHEGS LAS, BLO GROS

CHEN PO NYAN THOS KYI THEG PA PA RNAMS NI NYAN THOS KYI THEG
PAS GROL BA MA YIN TE, 'ON KYANG DE DAG GIS NI THEG PA CHEN
PO'I MTHAR THUG PA CAN YIN NO, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA DANG, PAD DKAR
LAS, DRANG SRONG CHEN POS THEG PA GSUM BSTAN

PA; ;RNAM 'DREN RNAMS KYI THABS LA MKHAS PA YIN, ,THEG PA GCIG
STE GNYIS SU YOD MA YIN, ,BSTI BA'I DON DU THEG PA GSUM BSTAN
TO, ,ZHES DANG, BDEN PA PO'I LE 'UR, 'JAM DPAL DE BZHIN GSHEGS
PAS KHA CIG LA NI THEG

PA CHEN PO STON PAR 'GYUR LA, KHA CIG LA NI NYAN THOS DANG
RANG SANGS RGYAS KYI THEG PA STON PAR 'GYUR NA, DE NI YONGS SU
MA DAG PAR 'GYUR, MNGON PAR ZHEN PA'I NYES PAR 'GYUR, 'DU SHES
THA DAD PA'I NYES PAR YANG 'GYUR,

@014A *, ,THUGS RJE CHEN PO NYES PAR YANG 'GYUR, CHOS LA DPE
'KHYUD BYAS PAR YANG 'GYUR, ZHES GDUL BYA RIGS CAN GSUM GA
RANG NYID KYIS BRNYES PA'I GO 'PHANG LA 'GOD PAR GSUNGS PA'I
PHYIR DANG, DPAL

PHRENG GI MDO LAS, YONGS SU MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS PA ZHES BYA BA
NI DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA RNAMS KYI THABS SO, ,ZHES DANG, PHYIR MI
LDOG PA'I 'KHOR LO'I MDO LAS, RIGS KYI BU SEMS CAN DE DAG NI
DMAN PA LA MOS PA

DAG STE, DE DAG THEG PA GCIG LA MI 'JUG PA LA THABS MKHAS PA
DE DAG NYE BAR KHRID DE, RIGS KYI BU SANGS RGYAS BCOM LDAN
'DAS RNAMS NI THABS MKHAS PA DANG LDAN PA'O, ,ZHES DANG, BYANG
CHUB SEMS 'GREL LAS,

THEG PA GNYIS PO DAG KYANG NI, ,THEG PA CHEN POR 'BYUNG BAS
NA, ,SRID PA'I LAM GYIS DU BA RNAMS LA, ,NGAL BSO'I DON DE DE
NYID MIN, ,ZHES DANG, DPE MED PAR BSTOD PA LAS, CHOS KYI
DBYINGS LA DBYER MED PHYIR, ,GTZO BO'I THEG

DBYER MA MCHIS KYANG, ,KHYOD KYIS SEMS CAN ZHUGS DON DU, ,THEG
PA GSUM DU GSUNGS PA'O, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR DANG, LHAG MED
MYANG 'DAS LA GNAS PA'I THEG DMAN DGRA BCOM PA THEG CHEN LAM
DU 'JUG PAR MDO SDE

DU MA LAS GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR TE, DE YANG LHAG BCAS MYANG 'DAS
LA GNAS PA'I NYAN THOS DGRA BCOM PA DES SKU TSE'I 'DU BYED
'PHO KAR ZAG BCAS KYI LUS 'DIR BOR NAS DAG PA'I ZHING DU
PADMA'I SBUBS SU YID KYI RANG BZHIN GYI

@014B LUS BLANGS LA, KHYAB PA 'DU BYED KYI SDUG BSNGAL NYE BAR
ZHI BA'I NYER ZHI LA SLAR MI LDANG BAR MNYAM PAR GZHAG PAR
BYA'O SNYAM DU 'PHEN PA BTANG BA LA BRTEN NAS DER SKYES MA
THAG TU DE LA MNYAM PAR 'JOG PA YIN TE, RGYAN SNANG LAS,

NYAN THOS CHEN PO RNAMS KYANG LHAG MA DANG BCAS PA DANG LHAG
MA MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I BYANG CHUB GNYIS PO THOB CING, SNYING
RJE DANG SHES RAB CHEN PO DANG BRAL BA SRID PA LA SKRAG PA'I
YID DANG SNGON GYI 'PHEN PA'I SHUGS KYIS 'PHANGS PA'I TSE

YONGS SU ZAD PAS MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS PAR GRAGS PA'I MYA NGAN LAS
'DAS PA'I MING CAN 'DU SHES MED PA KHAMS GSUM PAR SKYE BA LAS
'DAS PA, 'PHO BA'I SEMS KYI RJES THOB LA SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING
YONGS SU DAG PAR ZAG PA

MED PA'I DBYINGS LA MNYAM PAR BZHAG PA NYID DANG, PADMA'I
SNYING POR SKYE'O, ,ZHES DANG, NYAN THOS DE DAG JI SRID DU,
,SANGS RGYAS RNAMS KYIS MA BSGUL BA, ,DE SRID YE SHES LUS GCIG
GIS, ,TING 'DZIN MYOS PAS BRGYAL TE GNAS, ,ZHES

DANG; LANG GSHAGS LAS, TING NGE 'DZIN GYI LUS THOB NA, ,BSKAL
PA'I BAR DU MI SAD DO, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, DE LTAR ZAG
MED KYI DBYINGS LA SNYOMS PAR ZHUGS TE GNAS PA DE DAG LA DE
BZHIN GSHEGS PA RNAMS KYI 'OD ZER

KYIS BSKUL TE RJES THOB TU BZHENGS NAS RGYAL BA RNAMS LAS DAM
PA'I CHOS GSAN TE TSOGS GNYIS RGYA CHEN PO GSOG PAR 'GYUR TE,
DAM CHOS PAD DKAR LAS, 'KHOR BA'I SDUG BSNGAL DAG LAS KHYOD
THAR YANG, ,KHYOD NI DA DUNG MYA NGAN YONGS

@015A *, ,MI 'DA', ,SANGS RGYAS THEG PA 'DI NI BTZAL BAR RIGS,
,ZHES DANG, LANG GSHEGS LAS, JI LTAR SKYES BU MYOS PA NI,
,MYOS GYUR MED PA SANGS PA LTAR, ,DE BZHIN DE DAG NGA YI SKU,
,SANGS RGYAS CHOS ZHES BYA BA

'THOB, ,CES DANG, RGYAN SNANG LAS, DE NAS DE RNAMS LA YANG DAG
PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS 'OD DPAG TU MED PA LA SOGS PAS
NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'I MI SHES PA BSAL BAR BYA BA'I
PHYIR, 'OD KYI SNANG BAS SAD PAR MDZAD

NAS BYANG CHUB KYI SEMS BSKYED NAS GROL BA'I SKABS SU DMYAL BA
LA SOGS RGYU PA DANG 'DRA BAR 'GRO ZHING RIM GYIS BYANG CHUB
RIN PO CHE'I TSOGS BSAGS NAS 'JIG RTEN GYI BLA MAR 'GYUR, ZHES
LUNG LAS NGES PAR MDZAD PA YIN NO,,

ZHES SOGS GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, MTHAR THUG THEG PA GCIG TU RIGS
PAS GRUB STE, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI RGYUD KYI SGRIB PA DE
SEMS RGYUD DANG 'BRAL RUNG GI GLO BUR BA YIN ZHING, DE SPONG
BA'I THABS STON PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYI MDZAD

PA MI 'DOR BA'I PHYIR, MTHAR THUG THEG PA GSUM DU GSUNGS PA'I
MDO DANG MI 'GAL TE, DE LTAR GSUNGS PA DRANG DON DGONGS PA CAN
YIN PA'I PHYIR, DE LTAR GSUNGS PA'I DGONGS GZHI YOD DE, GNAS
SKABS SU MOS PA MI 'DRA

BA GSUM DANG KHAMS MI 'DRA BA GSUM THEG PA SO SO'I LAM DU DKRI
DGOS PA LA DGONGS PA'I PHYIR, DGOS PA YOD DE, GNYIS STONG BDEN
GRUB MA BKAG PAR THEG CHEN LAM DU 'KHRID DGOS PA'I GDUL BYA
RNAMS RJES SU BZUNG

@015B BAR BYA BA'I CHED YIN PA'I PHYIR, DED DPON THABS LA
MKHAS PAS LAM RING POS DUB PA'I TSONG PHRUG RNAMS DBUGS DBYUNG
BA'I PHYIR DU RGYA MTSO'I GLING DU GRONG KHYER SPRUL NAS DBUGS
PHYIN PAR BYAS TE SLAR YANG RIN PO CHE'I GLING LA 'KHRID PA

LTAR; 'KHOR BA'I SDUG BSNGAL GYIS YUN RING DU DU BA STE, RE
ZHIG THEG CHEN LAM DU 'JUG PAR MI 'DOD PA RNAMS THAR PA'I
GRONG KHYER DU DBUGS PHYIN PAR BYAS NAS, THEG CHEN DU DRANGS
PAR BYA BA'I DGOS PA YOD PA'I PHYIR TE, DE LTAR YANG, DBU

MA 'JUG PAR, DE'I PHYIR MKHAS PA RIN PO CHE YI GLING DU CHAS
PA'I SKYE TSOGS KYI, ,NGAL BA NYER SEL GRONG KHYER YID 'ONG
BAR DU RNAM PAR BKOD PA LTAR, ,KHYOD KYI THEG PA 'DI NI SLOB
MA NYE BAR ZHI BA'I TSUL LA YID, ,SBYAR ZHING RNAM PAR DBEN
PA'ANG

BLOS SBYANGS RNAMS LA LOGS SU GSUNGS, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR,
DNGOS LA GNOD BYED YOD DE, GZHAN DBANG DANG YONGS GRUB BDEN
PAR MA GRUB CING MTHAR THUG THEG PA GSUM DU GRUB PAR STON PA'I
MDO TSAD LDAN GYIS GNOD PA'I PHYIR, DES

NA GANG YANG DAG PA'I SKYON MED PA LA ZHUGS PA ZHES SOGS MTHAR
THUG THEG PA GSUM DU GRUB PAR STON PA'I MDO YIN ZHING, 'ON
KYANG GANG YANG DE DAG GI, ZHES SOGS KYIS DE DRANG DON DU
BKRAL BA YIN TE, NYI SNANG LAS, KHYAB PA NI LAM SHES PA

NYID KYI DBANG DU BYAS TE, SEMS BSKYED PA NAS BRTZAMS TE SHES
RAB KYI PHA ROL DU PHYIN PA'I PHYOGS GCIG PA YIN NO, ,ZHES
KHYAB PA'I DON DANG, GO RIMS DANG LDAN PA'I GANG ZAG GI KHYAD
PAR GYIS DON GYI GANG GSUNGS PA YIN PA'O, ,DE LTAR

@016A *, ,YIN YANG GAL TE DE DAG GIS BLA MED RDZOGS BYANG DU
SEMS BSKYED PAR GYUR NA DE DAG LA RJES SU YI RANG BAR BYA'O,
,ZHES GSUNGS PA NI SNGAR 'DOD CHAGS DANG BRAL PA'I DBANG DU
BYAS PAR ZAD PA YIN GYI, 'DIS NI THEG PA

GSUM RNAM PAR GZHAG PA NI DGONGS PA CAN YIN GYI MTSAN NYID PA
MIN NO ZHES 'CHAD PA YIN NO, ,ZHES DANG, RGYAN SNANG LAS, DE
BAS NA THEG PA THAMS CAD NI RNAM PA THAMS CAD DU THEG PA CHEN
POR GSAL BAR BSHAD PAR RIG PAR BYA STE, DE LTAR

NA PADMA DKAR PO DANG, BDEN PA PO'I LE'U SOGS LAS GSUNGS PA
LEGS PAR DRANGS PAR 'GYUR TE, SH'A RI'I BU KHYOD MA 'ONGS PA
NA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS SU 'GYUR TE, THEG PA
NI GCIG STE GNYIS SU MED DO, ,ZHES DANG,

LANG KAR GSHEGS PA LAS KYANG, BLO GROS CHEN PO NYAN THOS KYI
THEG PA PA RNAMS NI NYAN THOS KYI THEG PAS GROL BA MIN TE, 'ON

DANG, DE BZHIN DU SLOB DPON N'A GA DZU NA'I

ZHAL SNGA NAS DANG, DE'I RJES SU 'BRANG BA'I MTHAR THUG THEG
PA GCIG PU'I TSUL DU SMRA BA RNAMS KYIS, BYANG CHUB DAM PA
GNYIS THOB NAS, ,SRID PAS SKRAG YID DE DAG LA, ,ZHES PA NAS,
BYANG CHUB TU NI TSOGS BSAGS NAS, ,DE YANG

'JIG RTEN 'DREN PAR 'GYUR, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, ZHES
GSUNGS, ` GSUM PA ZHAR LA THEG PA'I RNAM GZHAG BSTAN PA LA
MTSAN NYID, DBYE BA, SA MTSAMS, GSUM DU 'BYED PA'I RGYU MTSAN
DANG BZHI LAS, DANG PO NI,

@016B DON GNYIS GANG RUNG KHUR DU 'KHYER BA'I LAM ZHUGS KYI
MNGON RTOGS DE THEG PA'I MTSAN NYID, GNYIS PA NI, DE LA THEG
CHEN GYI THEG PA DANG, THEG DMAN GYI THEG PA GNYIS SU YOD,
THEG PA GANG ZHIG ,CHEN PO BDUN DANG LDAN PAS RAB TU PHYE

PA DANG PO'I MTSAN NYID YIN TE, MDO SDE'I RGYAN LAS, DMIGS PA
CHE BA NYID DANG NI, ,DE BZHIN SGRUB PA GNYIS DAG DANG, ,YE
SHES BRTZON 'GRUS RTZOM PA DANG, ,THABS LA MKHAS PAR GYUR PA
DANG, ,YANG DAG 'GRUB PA CHEN PO DANG, ,SANGS RGYAS

'PHRIN LAS CHEN PO STE, ,CHEN PO 'DI DANG LDAN PA'I PHYIR,
,THEG CHEN ZHES NI NGES PAR BRJOD, ,CES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR,
THEG CHEN GYI THEG PA CHOS CAN, CHEN PO BDUN DANG LDAN TE,
DMIGS PA MDO SDE LA SOGS PA'I CHOS RGYA CHEN PO DANG

LDAN PA, SGRUB PA CHEN PO DON GNYIS SGRUB PA DANG, YE SHES
CHEN PO BDAG MED GNYIS RTOGS PA, RTZOM PA CHEN PO GRANGS MED
GSUM DU TSOGS GNYIS BSAGS PA, THABS MKHAS CHEN PO 'KHOR BA
YONGS SU 'DZIN CING NYON MONGS

PA SPANG BYA'I GTZO BOR MI BYED PA, YANG DAG PAR 'GRUB PA CHEN
PO STOBS SOGS 'GRUB PA, 'PHRIN LAS CHEN PO MNGON PAR SANGS
RGYAS TE SEMS CAN MTHA' YAS PA'I DON BYED PA DANG LDAN PA'I
PHYIR, THEG PA GANG ZHIG ,CHEN

PO BDUN DANG MI LDAN PAS RAB TU PHYE BA, GNYIS PA'I MTSAN
NYID, DBYE NA, NYAN THOS KYI THEG PA, RANG RGYAL GYI THEG PA
GNYIS SU YOD, GSUM PA NI, TSOGS LAM NAS SANGS RGYAS KYI SI'I
BAR DU YOD, BZHI PA NI, THEG PA LA GSUM 

@017A *, ,DU 'BYED PA'I RGYU MTSAN YOD DE, THEG CHEN GYI THEG
PA DANG, THEG DMAN ME THEG PA GNYIS LAM SPYI'I LUS MI 'DRA
ZHING THOB BYA'I 'BRAS BU LA DMAN MCHOG GI RIM PA YOD PAS
GNYIS KA'I SGO NAS BZHAG ,NYAN

THOS KYI THEG PA DANG, RANG RGYAL GYI THEG PA GNYIS LA LAM
SPYI'I LUS MI 'DRA BA'I KHYAD PAR CHER MED KYANG 'BRAS BU LA
DMAN MCHOG GI RIM PA YOD PAS DE'I SGO NAS BZHAG PA'I PHYIR,
GNYIS PA NYAN RANG THEG CHEN LAM DU 'JUG PA'I

TSE GANG NAS 'JUG PA BSHAD PA LA, DGONGS 'GREL GYI RGYA NAG
'GREL CHEN DU, NYAN THOS DGRA BCOM PA THEG CHEN LAM DU 'JUG
PA'I TSE SA BRGYAD PA NAS 'JUG PAR BSHAD KYANG TSOGS LAM NAS
'JUG PA 'THAD, CES GSUNGS PA

DANG; TSIG GSAL LAS, NYAN THOS DANG RANG SANGS RGYAS DE DAG
ZHI BA'I DBYINGS LAS LANGS TE LAM MCHOG SHES PAR BYED PA NA
SKABS DANG PO NAS BSTAN PA'I SEMS BSKYED PA THOG MA DANG GNYIS
PA DANG GSUM PA DANG POR

BYA STE ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR THEG CHEN GYI TSOGS LAM NAS 'JUG
PA YIN TE, SANGS RGYAS THOB PA LA THEG CHEN GYI TSOGS SBYOR
GYI GNAS SKABS SU BSKAL CHEN GRANGS MED GCIG DANG, MA DAG SA
BDUN DU GRANGS MED GCIG DANG,

DAG PA SA GSUM DU GRANGS MED GCIG STE GRANGS MED GSUM DU TSOGS
GSOG DGOS PA'I PHYIR, KHA CIG ,DE SA BRGYAD PA NAS 'JUG ZER BA
DANG, KHA CIG SA DANG PO NAS 'JUG ZER, MYUR TU SANGS RGYAS
THOB PAR 'DOD PAS DANG POR NYAN

@017B THOS LAM DU 'JUG RIGS PAR THAL, DAM BCA' DE GNYIS 'THAD
PA GANG ZHIG ,SANGS RGYAS THOB PA LA THEG CHEN GYI TSOGS SBYOR
DU GRANGS MED GCIG TSOGS BSAGS DGOS, BRTZON 'GRUS SHIN TU 'BAR
BA'I NYAN THOS TSOGS LAM PAS TSE GSUM

LA NYAN THOS DGRA BCOM PA'I 'BRAS BU MNGON DU BYED NUS PA'I
PHYIR TE, MDZOD LAS, MYUR BA SRID PA GSUM GYI MTHAR, ,ZHES
GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, 'DOD MI NUS TE, NYAN THOS DGRA BCOM PA'I
RTOGS PA SNGON DU SONG BA'I BYANG SEMS RNAMS DMAN

LAM SNGON DU MA SONG BA'I BYANG SEMS LAS SANGS RGYAS THOB PA
CHES BUL BA'I PHYIR TE, MDO SDE'I RGYAN LAS, DE NYID YANG DANG
YANG DU NI, ,MYA NGAN 'DAS LA MNGON DGA'I PHYIR, ,RANG SEMS
KUN TU 'JUG LDAN PAS, ,RTOGS PA BUL BA YIN PAR 'DOD,,

CES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, DE YANG THUB DGONGS LTAR NA BSKAL CHEN
GRANGS MED PA GCIG GIS BUL LA, DGE BA'I LHAS GRANGS MED BZHI
BCUS BUL BAR BSHAD DO, ,KHA CIG ,NYAN THOS DGRA BCOM PA'I
RTOGS PA SNGON DU SONG BA'I BYANG SEMS TSOGS

LAM PA DE SO SO SKYE BO YIN ZER NA, DES LAM BDEN MA THOB PAR
THAL, DAM BCA' 'THAD PA'I PHYIR, KHYAB STE, MDZOD LAS, LAM MA
THOB PA SO SO YI, ,SKYE BOR 'DOD DO, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR,
KHA CIG ,DE THEG CHEN 'PHAGS PAR 'DOD

PA YANG MI 'THAD DE, DES THEG CHEN GYI 'PHAGS LAM MA THOB PA'I
PHYIR, DE THEG CHEN TSOGS LAM PA YIN PA'I PHYIR, KHO NA RE,
THEG DMAN TSOGS LAM PA YIN NA THEG DMAN SO SKYE YIN PAS KHYAB
PAR THAL LO, ,THEG CHEN LA DE'I PHYIR ZER

@018A *, ,NA MA KHYAB, 'DOD NA, SPANG BYA CIG CHAR BA'I RGYUN
ZHUGS KYI RTOGS PA SNGON DU SONG BA'I RANG RGYAL TSOGS LAM PA
CHOS CAN, DER THAL, DE'I PHYIR, KHO NA RE, LAM LNGA 'GAL BAR
THAL, SLOB LAM DANG MI SLOB LAM

GNYIS 'GAL BA'I PHYIR, 'DOD NA, TSOGS LAM DANG MI SLOB LAM
GNYIS 'GAL BAR THAL, 'DOD PA'I PHYIR NA MA KHYAB, KHO NA RE,
DE CHOS CAN, THEG CHEN 'PHAGS PA YIN PAR THAL, THEG CHEN SEMS
BSKYED RGYUD LDAN GYI 'PHAGS PA

YIN PA'I PHYIR NA MA KHYAB STE, DE CHOS CAN, THEG CHEN DGRA
BCOM DU THAL, THEG CHEN SEMS BSKYED THOB PA'I DGRA BCOM YIN
PA'I PHYIR, KHYAB PA KHAS, GZHAN YANG, THEG CHEN SEMS BSKYED
THOB PA'I 'PHAGS PA YIN NA THEG CHEN 'PHAGS

PA YIN PAS KHYAB PAR THAL LO, ,DE THEG CHEN 'PHAGS PA YIN PA'I
PHYIR, RTAGS KHAS, 'DOD NA, BYANG SEMS TSOGS LAM PA'I RTOGS PA
SNGON DU SONG BA'I NYAN THOS MTHONG LAM PA CHOS CAN, DER THAL,
DE'I PHYIR, GZHAN YANG RNAM

BSHAD LAS, MTSAN GZHI NI NYAN THOS KYI LAM SHES PA'I LAM SHES
SOGS STONG NYID MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA'I SHES RAB KYIS ZIN PA'I
THEG CHEN 'PHAGS PA'I MNGON PAR RTOGS PA MTHA' DAG GO ZHES
GSUNGS PA MI 'THAD PAR

THAL; BYANG SEMS TSOGS LAM PA'I RGYUD LA LAM SHES YOD PA'I
PHYIR, GZHAN YANG, DE NYID LAS, SA MTSAMS NI THEG PA CHEN PO'I
MTHONG LAM NAS SANGS RGYAS KYI SA'I BAR DU YOD DO ZHES GSUNGS PA
MI 'THAD PAR THAL,

@018B RTAGS SNGA MA DE'I PHYIR, KHO NA RE, RNAM BSHAD LAS,
MTSAN NYID NI RANG RGYUD LDAN GYI GANG ZAG GI RGYUD KYI STONG
NYID MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA'I SHES RAB KYIS ZIN PA'I THEG PA
CHEN PO'I GANG ZAG GI MNGON PAR RTOGS PA'O ZHES GSUNGS PA MI
'THAD

PAR THAL, STONG NYID MNGON SUM DU RTOGS PA'I THEG CHEN GYI
TSOGS LAM DE LAM SHES MA YIN PA'I PHYIR NA MA KHYAB, KHA CIG
,NYAN THOS DGRA BCOM PA'I RTOGS PA SNGON DU SONG BA'I BYANG
SEMS TSOGS LAM PA DE 'PHAGS PA PHUNG SUM PA

YIN TE, DE 'PHAGS PA GANG ZHIG ,THEG CHEN 'PHAGS PA YANG MA
YIN, THEG DMAN 'PHAGS PA YANG MA YIN PA'I PHYIR ZER NA MI
'THAD DE, SPANG BYA CIG CHAR BA'I RGYUN ZHUGS KYI RTOGS PA
SNGON DU SONG BA'I RANG RGYAL TSOGS LAM PA DE THEG DMAN

GYI 'PHAGS PA PHUNG SUM PA YIN PAR THAL, DE THEG DMAN 'PHAGS
PA YIN PA GANG ZHIG DE NYAN THOS 'PHAGS PA DANG, RANG RGYAL
'PHAGS PA GANG RUNG MA YIN PA'I PHYIR, KHYAB PA KHAS, 'DOD MI
NUS TE, THEG DMAN 'PHAGS PA YIN PA'I PHYIR,

KHA CIG ,DE DGRA BCOM MA YIN ZER BA MI 'THAD DE, DE SRID NYON
DGU PA SPANGS PA'I 'PHAGS PA YIN PA'I PHYIR, KHYAB STE, MDZOD
LAS, DGU PA'I BAR CHAD MED LAM GANG, ,DE NI RDO RJE LTA BU
YIN, ,DE ZAD THOB DANG ZAD PA SHES, ,DE'I TSE DE MI SLOB DGRA

BCOM, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, KHA CIG ,DE MI SLOB PA MA YIN
ZER NA, 'PHAGS PA'I SPANGS RTOGS LAS NYAMS PA YOD PAR THAL,
NYAN THOS DGRA BCOM MI SLOB PA GANG ZHIG ,DE'I RTOGS PA SNGON
DU SONG BA'I BYANG SEMS TSOGS LAM PA SLOB

@019A *, ,PA YIN PA'I PHYIR, KHA CIG ,NYAN THOS DGRA BCOM PA
YANG SLOB PAR 'DOD PA MI 'THAD DE, DE'I RGYUD LA MI SLOB LA MA
YOD PA'I PHYIR TE, DE'I RGYUD LA LAM LNGA PO GANG RUNG YOD,
DE'I RGYUD LA LAM DANG PO BZHI PO GANG RUNG MED

PA'I PHYIR, GZHAN YANG, MI SLOB PA'I LNGA PHRUGS DANG PHUN
TSOGS 'OG MA'I LNGA PHRUGS LA ZLOS SKYON YOD PAR THAL, MI SLOB
PA'I RNAM GROL YIN NA MI SLOB PA'I RNAM GROL PHUN TSOGS YIN
DGOS PA'I PHYIR TE, MI SLOB PA'I GANG ZAG YIN NA SANGS

RGYAS 'PHAGS PA YIN DGOS PA'I PHYIR, ` GSUM PA 'KHOR BA LA
MTHA' YOD MED DPYAD PA LA, KHA CIG GIS, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD
SANGS RGYA, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD SANGS RGYAS PA'I DUS MI SRID,
'KHOR BA LA MTHA'

MED ZER NA, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD SANGS RGYAS PA'I DUS SRID PAR
THAL, BYANG SEMS 'PHAGS PA THAMS CAD SANGS RGYAS PA'I DUS SRID
PA'I PHYIR TE, BYANG SEMS RGYUN MTHA' PA THAMS CAD SANGS RGYAS
PA'I DUS SRID PA'I PHYIR,

RGYUN MTHA'I BAR CHAD MED LAM BA SANGS RGYAS PA'I DUS SRID PA'I
PHYIR, MA GRUB NA, DE CHOS CAN, DER THAL, KHYOD RANG GI SKAD CIG
GNYIS PAR RNAM MKHYEN MNGON DU BYED PA'I GANG ZAG YIN PA'I
PHYIR, KHO NA RE, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD

SANGS RGYAS PA'I DUS KYI LONGS SKU YOD PAR THAL, SEMS CAN
THAMS CAD SANGS RGYAS PA'I DUS SRID PA'I PHYIR, 'DOD NA, DE
KHO KHO RANG DU THAL LO, ,'DOD NA, DE CHOS CAN, NGES PA LDA
LDAN GYI GZUGS SKU YIN PAR THAL, 'DOD PA'I

@019B PHYIR; 'DOD NA, DE CHOS CAN, KHYOD KYI 'KHOR DU BYUNG
BA'I BYANG SEMS 'PHAGS PA YOD PAR THAL, 'DOD PA'I PHYIR, 'DOD
NA, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD SANGS RGYAS PA'I DUS NA BYANG SEMS
'PHAGS PA YOD PAR THAL, 'DOD PA'I PHYIR

NA; MA KHYAB STE, BYANG SEMS 'PHAGS PA THAMS CAD SANGS RGYAS
PA'I DUS NA BYANG SEMS 'PHAGS PA YOD PAR THAL, DE'I DUS NA
BYANG SEMS 'PHAGS PA THAMS CAD SANGS RGYAS PA'I DUS KYI LONGS
SKU'I 'KHOR DU BYUNG BA'I BYANG SEMS,

'PHAGS PA YOD PA'I PHYIR, KHYAB PA KHAS, KHO NA RE, SEMS CAN
THAMS CAD SANGS RGYAS PA'I TSE NA SANGS MA RGYAS PA'I SEMS CAN
MED PAR THAL, DE'I TSE SEMS CAN THAMS CAD SANGS RGYAS PA'I
PHYIR, 'DOD NA, SEMS CAN THAMS

CAD SANGS RGYAS PA'I TSE NA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD SANGS RGYAS
PA'I SANGS RGYAS 'PHAGS PA'I 'KHOR DU BYUNG BA'I SEMS CAN MED
PAR THAL, 'DOD PA'I PHYIR NA MA KHYAB, KHA CIG RTZA BAR MA
KHYAB ZER BA MI 'THAD DE, DE'I TSE NA SEMS CAN YOD

PAR THAL, DE'I TSE NA SANGS MA RGYAS PA'I SEMS CAN YOD PA GANG
ZHIG ,SANGS MA RGYAS PA'I SEMS CAN DANG, SEMS CAN GNYIS DON
GCIG PA'I PHYIR, KHA CIG ,SEMS CAN THAMS CAD SANGS RGYAS PA'I
TSE NA SEMS CAN YOD PAR THAL,

DE'I TSE NA SEMS CAN SANGS RGYAS 'PHAGS PA YIN PA'I PHYIR TE,
DE'I TSE NA SEMS CAN SANGS RGYAS 'PHAGS PAR GYUR ZIN PA'I
PHYIR NA MA KHYAB, KHA CIG ,RTZA BAR MA KHYAB ZER BA MI 'THAD
DE, DE'I TSE NA SEMS CAN GANG ZAG YIN PAR THAL,

@020A *, ,DE'I TSE NA DE SANGS RGYAS 'PHAGS PA YIN PA'I PHYIR,
'DOD NA, DE'I TSE NA DE SROG DBANG RGYUD LDAN GYI GANG ZAG YIN
PAR THAL, 'DOD PA'I PHYIR, 'DOD NA, DE'I TSE DE'I RGYUD LA
SROG DBANG YOD PAR THAL, 'DOD PA'I

PHYIR; 'DOD NA, DE'I TSE NA SEMS CAN YOD PAR THAL LO, ,GZHAN
YANG, RIGS GTER LAS, SA BON THOG MTHA' YOD MIN YANG, ,MES
BSREGS PA NA PHYI MTHA' MTHONG, ,DE BZHIN 'KHOR BA THOG MED
KYANG, ,BDAG MED MTHONG BAS PHYI MTHA'

'GRUB, ,CES GSUNGS PA MI 'THAD PAR THAL, 'KHOR BA'I PHYI MTHA'
MED PA'I PHYIR, KHO NA RE, 'KHOR BA'I MTHA' MED PAR THAL,
'KHOR BA DE THOG MA DANG THA MA MED PA STONG PA NYID KYI STONG
GZHI CHOS CAN YIN PA'I PHYIR ZER NA MA KHYAB STE,

DUS GSUM PO DE MI DMIGS PA YIN PAR THAL, DE MI DMIGS PA STONG
PA NYID KYI STONG GZHI CHOS CAN YIN PA'I PHYIR, KHYAB PA KHAS,
KHA CIG ,'KHOR BA'I PHYI MTHA' YOD PAR THAL, 'KHOR BA'I MTHA'
YOD PA'I PHYIR TE, SRID PA'I

MTHA' YOD PA'I PHYIR TE, SRID MTHA' LA GNAS PA'I BYANG SEMS
KYI RGYUD KYI 'KHOR BA DE SRID PA'I THA MA YIN PA'I PHYIR, MA
GRUB NA, DE CHOS CAN, DER THAL, KHYOD SRID PA THA MA PA YIN
PA'I PHYIR ZER NA MI 'THAD DE, SA GNYIS PA PA'I RGYUD LA

'KHOR BA YOD PAR THAL, SRID PA THA MA PA'I BYANG SEMS KYI
RGYUD LA DE YOD PA'I PHYIR, 'DOD NA, DE 'KHOR BA PA YIN PAR
THAL, 'DOD PA'I PHYIR, 'DOD MI NUS TE, 'JUG PAR, RGYAL SRAS
ZLA BA LAS BYUNG SRID MIN SRID PA YI, ,DPAL

@020B GYUR, ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, KHO NA RE, SEMS CAN THAMS
CAD SANGS RGYAS PA'I TSE NA BYANG SEMS TSOGS LAM PA SANGS
RGYAS PAR THAL, DE'I TSE SEMS CAN THAMS CAD SANGS RGYAS PA'I
PHYIR, 'DOD MI NUS TE, DE'I TSE NA SANGS

RGYAS KYI 'PHRIN LAS 'JUG YUL DU GYUR PA'I BYANG SEMS TSOGS
LAM PA YOD PA'I PHYIR, ZHES ZER NA MA KHYAB, DES NA 'KHOR BA
LA THOG MA'I MTHA' MED KYANG THA MA'I MTHA' YOD DE, SEMS CAN
THAMS CAD SANGS RGYA NGES YIN PA'I

PHYIR; SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI RGYUD KYI SGRIB PA DE GNYEN POS
SPONG RUNG YIN PA'I PHYIR, DE LTAR YANG, 'GREL CHEN LAS, GANG
GNYEN PO'I CHOS DANG PHRAD PA NA 'BRI BA'I CHOS CAN DU SNANG
BA DE NI GNYEN PO'I PHYOGS SHIN TU 'PHEL BA NA

SHIN TU 'GRIB PAR GYUR PA SRID PA YIN TE, DPER NA, GSER GYI
DRI MA LA SOGS PA BZHIN NO, ,'KHOR BA YANG BDAG MED PA LA SOGS
PA'I MTSAN NYID KYI GNYEN PO'I PHYOGS MNGON DU GYUR PA NA
'GRIB PA'I CHOS CAN YIN NO, ,ZHES

GSUNGS PA'I RANG BZHIN GYI GTAN TSIGS KYI STOBS KYIS 'KHOR BA
RGYUN CHAD PA YIN NO ZHES 'DOD DO, ,ZHES GSUNGS, KHO NA RE,
'KHOR BA LA MTHA' YOD PA MI 'THAD DE, THOG MA MED PA NAS SANGS
RGYAS RE RE BYON PAS KYANG SEMS

CAN GRANGS MED PA MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS PA LA BKOD KYANG, SEMS CAN
LA ZAD PA'I MTHA' MED PA'I PHYIR, ZHES ZER, DE LTAR YANG, RGYAN
SNANG LAS, KHA CIG NA RE, GANG 'DI SANGS RGYAS KYI RIGS 'DI THOG
MA MED PA YIN PA'AM, SANGS RGYAS RE RE BYUNG BA

@021A *, ,NA SEMS CAN GRANGS MED PA MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS MOD KYI,
DE LTAR NA YANG 'KHOR BZAD PA MED PAS MTHA' YAS PA'I PHYIR NAM
MKHA' DANG 'DRA STE, RI PO LA SOGS PA'I SGRIB G-YOGS DU MA MOD
KYANG NAM MKHA' LA NI

YONGS SU ZAD PA MED DO, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, LEGS BSHAD GSER
PHRENG LTAR NA, 'GREL PA CHE CHUNG GNYIS DANG AA BHYA SOGS KYIS
'KHOR BA MTHA' YOD DU 'DOD KYANG, MTHA' MED KYI PHYOGS 'THAD PA
YIN TE, MTHA' YOD RNAMS

KYI 'DOD PA'I RIGS PA NI, RNAM 'GREL LAS, 'GRIB DANG PHUL BYUNG
SRID PAR 'JUG ,MI MTHUN PHYOGS DANG BCAS NYID PHYIR, ,DE GOMS PA
LA BDAG 'GYUR PAS, ,LA LAR ZAG PA ZAD PAR 'GYUR, ,ZHES PA'I DON
DU SNANG LA, DE NI

SHES RGYUD LA LAR CHAGS SOGS NYES PA DANG BRAL BA BYUNG SRID PA
TZAM DU SGRUB PA YIN ZHING, DE NI SEMS CAN RE RE ZHING SANGS
RGYAS SGRUB DGOS PAS DE'I SGRUB BYED DU MI 'GYUR BA'I PHYIR, DES
NA 'KHOR BA LA MTHA' YOD PA'I SGRUB BYED MTHAR THUG

NI DRI MA GLO BUR BA DANG SEMS KYI RANG BZHIN 'OD GSAL BA YIN
PAS RKYEN DANG 'PHRAD NA GNYEN PO SKYE RUNG DANG SGRIB PA SPANGS
RUNG TZAM YIN LA DE TZAM GYIS 'KHOR BA'I MTHA' YOD PAR SGRUB MI
NUS PA'I PHYIR, 'BRAS BU 'BYUNG RUNG 'BYUNG

NGES LA 'KHRUL BA'I PHYIR RO, ,GNYIS PA GZHUNG DON NI, BYANG
CHUB SEMS DPA' LAS GZHAN PA'I RGYUD LA LAM SHES MI SKYE BA MA
YIN TE, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI RGYUD LA SANGS RGYAS KYI RIGS
KYIS KHYAB PA'I PHYIR, KHAMS GSUM

@021B LAS 'DOD CHAGS DANG BRAL BA'I NYAN RANG DGRA BCOM PA DANG
'DOD CHAGS DANG MA BRAL BA'I PHYI ROL PA CHOS CAN, KHYOD LA
SANGS RGYAS KYI RIGS KYIS KHYAB PA YIN TE, KHYOD SANGS RGYAS
THOB PHYIR DU LAM SHES SGOM DGOS KYI GANG ZAG YIN PA'I

PHYIR TE, DE RNAMS KYIS SANGS RGYAS THOB PHYIR DU LAM SHES SGOM
DGOS TE, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD SANGS RGYAS PA'I DUS SRID PA'I PHYIR
TE, MTHAR THUG THEG PA GCIG TU GRUB PA'I PHYIR, MTHAR THUG THEG
PA GCIG TU GRUB PA LA MTHAR THUG THEG

PA GSUM DU GRUB PAR STON PA'I MDOS MI GNOD DE, DE 'DRA BA DE
DRANG DON DGONGS PA CAN YIN GYI NGES DON MTSAN NYID PA NI MA YIN
NO, ,ZHES SHING RTA CHEN PO MGON PO KLU SGRUB DANG THOGS MED KYI
LUGS LAS 'BYUNG BA'I PHYIR, KHO NA RE, LHAS BYIN

TSAD MAS MA DMIGS PA'I SA PHYOGS CHOS CAN, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD
SANGS RGYAS PA'I DUS SRID PAR THAL, MTHAR THUG THEG PA GCIG TU
GRUB PA'I PHYIR, 'DOD NA, DE CHOS CAN, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD YOD
PAR THAL LO, ,'DOD NA, DE

CHOS CAN, LHAS BYIN YOD PAR THAL LO, ,'DOD PA'I PHYIR, MA KHYAB
NA, LHAS BYIN CHOS CAN, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD YOD NA KHYOD YOD DGOS
PAR THAL, KHYOD SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI KHONGS SU GTOGS PA'I
PHYIR NA MA KHYAB STE, CHOS DE DANG PHAN TSUN THA DAD DU

GYUR PA'I LHAS BYIN DANG, RANG RGYUD KYI SGRIB PA SOGS SBYAR NAS
SKYON 'PHEN TSUL SHES PAR BYA'O, ` ,GNYIS PA LAM SHES KYI NGO BO

@022A *, ,KHYAD PAR CAN DANG LDAN NO, ,ZHES 'CHAD PA LA, MDO
LAS, KHO BOS NI DE DAG GIS DGE BA'I PHYOGS LA BAR CHAD MI BYED
DE, ZHES GSUNGS, DE'I DON 'CHAD PA LA, RANG BZHIN DANG NI, ZHES
DANG, BYANG CHUB TU SEMS

BSKYED PA NI 'KHOR BA JI SRID PAR SEMS CAN GYI DON BYED PAR
ZHUGS PA NYID KYIS NYON MONGS PA RNAM PA THAMS CAD DU SPANGS PA
MA YIN PA ZHES BYA BA NI RANG BZHIN YIN NO, ,ZHES GSUNGS, DE'I
SKABS SU MTHA' DPYAD PA LA, 'O NA, NYON MONGS PA

RNAM PA THAMS CAD DU SPANGS PA MA YIN PA, ZHES 'CHAD NA, SKABS
'DIR BSTAN GYI MI SPONG RGYU'I NYON MONGS DE GANG ZHE NA, DE LA
BYANG SEMS 'PHAGS PA GZHAN DON DU 'KHOR BAR SKYE BA LEN PA'I
RGYU BSHAD PA DANG, DE BRGAL LAN GYI SGO NAS GTAN

LA DBAB PA DANG GNYIS LAS, DANG PO LA, BSTAN BCOS LAS GSUNGS
TSUL DANG, MDO LAS GSUNGS TSUL GNYIS LAS, DANG PO NI, NYI SNANG
LAS, BAG LA NYAL THAMS CAD NAS THAMS CAD DU MED PA NI MA RIG PA
DANG LTA BAS BSDUS PA'I

BAG LA NYAL YIN GYI, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' NI BSAM BZHIN DU SRID
PA LEN PA'I PHYIR, 'DOD PA DANG SRID PA'I ZAG PAS BSDUS PA NI MA
YIN NO, ,ZHES DANG, BAG LA NYAL KUN 'JOMS PA DANG, ,ZHES PA'I
THAD KYI 'GREL CHEN LAS, MA RIG

PA DANG LTA BAS BSDUS PA'I BAG LA NYAL SPONG GI 'DOD PA DANG
SRID PA'I ZAG PA NI MA YIN TE, BSAM BZHIN DU SRID PAR SKYE BA
LEN PA'I PHYIR ZHES DMAN LAM SNGON DU MA SONG BA'I BYANG SEMS
'PHAGS PAS BDEN 'DZIN DU GYUR PA'I MA RIG PA

@022B DANG; 'JIG LTA'I BAG LA NYAL SPANG BYA'I GTZO BOR BYED
CING, DES 'DOD PA'I SAS BSDUS KYI 'DOD CHAGS DANG, GZUGS KYI SAS
BSDUS KYI 'DOD CHAGS GNYIS PO DE GZHAN DON DU 'KHOR BAR SKYES PA
LEN PA'I RGYUR DGOS PAR

GSUNGS, GNYIS PA LA BLO GROS RGYA MTSOS ZHUS PA'I MDO LAS GSUNGS
TSUL DANG, DPAL PHRENG GI MDO LAS GSUNGS TSUL GNYIS LAS, DANG PO
NI, DE NYID LAS, DE DAG GI 'KHOR BA'I RGYU DGE BA'I RTZA BA DANG
MTSUNGS PAR LDAN PA'I NYON

MONGS PA DE GANG ZHE NA, 'DI LTA STE, BSOD NAMS KYI TSOGS YONGS
SU 'TSOL BAS MI NGOMS PA DANG, BSAM BZHIN DU SRID PAR SKYE BA
YONGS SU 'DZIN PA DANG, SANGS RGYAS DANG PHRAD PA DON DU GNYER
BA DANG, SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR

BYA BA'I PHYIR MI SKYO BA DANG, DAM PA'I CHOS 'DZIN PA LA BRTZON
PA DANG, SEMS CAN GYI BYA BA CI YOD PA LA 'GRUB PA DANG, CHOS LA
CHAGS PA'I BSAM PA DANG MA BRAL BA DANG, PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I
KUN TU SBYOR BA RNAMS MI 'DOR BA STE, ZHES BYANG

SEMS 'PHAGS PA GZHAN DON DU 'KHOR BAR SKYE BA LEN PA'I RGYU
BRGYAD GSUNGS, 'DI DAG DGE RTZA YIN NA NYON MONGS PA MA YIN PAS
DGE RTZA DANG MTSUNGS LDAN GYI NYON MONGS PA ZHES GSUNGS PA MI
'THAD PAR 'GYUR RAM ZHES PA'I DRI BA NI,

MDO DE NYID LAS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS GANG GI TSE DGE BA'I RTZA BA
LAGS NA DE'I RGYU CI'I SLAD DU NYON MONGS PA ZHES BGYI, ZHES
GSUNGS, DE RNAMS NYON MONGS PA DNGOS MIN KYANG NYON MONGS PA'I

@023A *, ,BA DANG BYED LAS MTSUNGS PA'I PHYIR TE, NYON MONGS PAS
RANG RGYUD LDAN GYI GANG ZAG KHAMS GSUM DU SBYOR BAR BYED LA,
'DIS KYANG DE LTAR SBYOR BAR BYED PA'I PHYIR, ZHES 'CHAD PA LA,
BLO GROS RGYA MTSO 'DI

LTAR DE LTA BU'I RANG BZHIN GYI NYON MONGS PA DE DAG GIS BYANG
CHUB SEMS DPA' KHAMS GSUM DU KUN TU SBYOR BA LA, KHAMS GSUM PA
YANG NYON MONGS PA LAS BYUNG BA YIN NO ZHES GSUNGS, BTAGS PA'I
DGOS PA MDOS

DNGOS SU MA ZIN KYANG DON THOB 'DI YIN TE, BYANG SEMS 'PHAGS PA
NI GZHAN DON LHUR LEN PA YIN NO ZHES SHES BAR BYA BA'I CHED YIN
PA'I PHYIR TE, DES GZHAN DON DU SRID PAR NYING MTSAMS SBYOR BA'I
PHYIR RANG DON DU NYON MONGS PA

YANG MI SPONG BAR SHES PAR BYA BA'I CHED YIN PA'I PHYIR, DNGOS
LA GNOD BYED YOD DE, DES SEMS NYE BAR NYON MONGS BAR BYED MI NUS
PA'I PHYIR, ZHES 'CHAD PA LA, DE NYID LAS, JI SRID KHAMS GSUM
KUN TU SBYOR BAS YIN GYI

SEMS NYE BAR NYON MONGS PAS NI MA YIN NO, ,ZHES GSUNGS, GNYIS PA
NI, MDO DE NYID LAS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPER NA LEN PA'I RKYEN GYIS
ZAG PA DANG BCAS PA'I LAS KYI RGYU LAS SRID PA GSUM 'BYUNG BA DE
BZHIN DU,

@023B GSUNGS PAS KYANG NYON MONGS PA'I BAG CHAGS SAM, MA RIG BAG

DAG ZHING DANG DAG SA LA GNAS PA'I BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' GZHAN
DON DU 'KHOR BAR SKYE BA LEN PA'I RGYUR GSUNGS SO, ,GNYIS PA LA
BYANG SEMS 'PHAGS PA'I RGYUD KYI SNYING RJE CHEN PO DANG SMON
LAM SOGS BYANG SEMS 'PHAGS PAS CHED DU GNYER

NAS MI SPONG RGYU'I NYON MONGS YIN ZER BA DANG, KHA CIG SRID
PA'I SKYE BA DE DE YIN ZER BA DANG, KHA CIG BLO GROS RGYA MTSOS
ZHUS PA'I MDO LAS GSUNGS PA'I BYANG 'PHAGS 'KHOR BAR SKYE BA LEN
PA'I RGYU BRGYAD PO DE DE YIN ZER BA RNAMS MI 'THAD

DE; BYANG SEMS 'PHAGS PA'I CHED DU GNYER NAS MI SPONG RGYU'I

YIN DGOS PA'I PHYIR DANG, DE YIN NA, NYAN RANG SLOB PA 'PHAGS
PA'I RANG NYID SPANG BYA'I GTZO BOR BYAS

NAS SPONG BAS KHYAB PA'I PHYIR TE, NYAN RANG SLOB PA 'PHAGS PAS
SKABS 'DIR BSTAN GYI NYON MONGS SPANG BYA'I GTZO BOR BYAS NAS
SPONG, BYANG SEMS 'PHAGS PAS DE DE LTAR MI SPONG BA'I RGYU MTSAN
GYIS BYANG SEMS 'PHAGS PA'I RGYUD KYI

LAM SHES DE NYAN RANG GI LAM LAS RANG BZHIN GYI SGO NAS KHYAD

@024A *, ,SOGS PA'I LAM GYI 'BRAS BU DANG LAM GYI RTOGS PA SO

@025A *, ,BYANG SEMS 'PHAGS PA'I CHED DU GNYER NAS MI SPONG

POR BYED LA SOGS DANG, ,SLOB MA BSE RU'I LAM GANG DANG, ,ZHES

KYI YAN LAG MA THOB PAR LAM

SHES MI 'THOB PA'I RGYU MTSAN GYIS DE LTAR BSHAD PA'I PHYIR, 'O

PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID DANG LDAN PA'I SEMS BSKYED PAS DE MI
DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS GZUGS

NI MI RTAG PA NYID DU YID LA BYA'O, ,SDUG BSNGAL BA NYID DANG,
BDAG MED PA NYID DANG, ZHI BA NYID DANG, NAD NYID DANG, 'BRAS
NYID DANG, ZUG RNGU NYID DANG, SDIG PA NYID DANG, PHA ROL NYID
DANG, 'JIG PA'I CHOS CAN NYID DANG, G-YO BA NYID DANG, RAB TU

'JIG PA NYID DANG, 'JIG PA NYID DANG, 'GO BA'I NAD NYID DANG,
NYE BAR 'TSE BA NYID DU YID LA BYA'O, ,ZHES SOGS GSUNGS PA'I
PHYIR, GNYIS PA LA, MTSAMS SBYAR, RTZA BA 'GREL PA'O, ,DANG PO
NI, GONG DU DE LTAR LAM SHES KYI RTEN LA

SOGS PA'I YAN LAG RNAMS BRJOD PA'I 'OG TU, NYAN THOS KYI LAM
SHES PA'I LAM SHES SOGS 'CHAD PA'I RGYU MTSAN YOD DE, LAM SHES
KYI SKABS SU BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I THEG PA GSUM GYI LAM THAMS
CAD RANG RGYUD LA BSKYED

NAS LAM THAMS CAD RDZOGS PAR SHES PAR BYA DGOS PA'I RGYU MTSAN
GYIS DE LTAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR, ZHES MTSAMS SBYOR BA LA, DE LTAR
RTEN LA SOGS PA BRJOD NAS LAM SHES PA NYID KYI SKABS SU LAM
THAMS CAD RDZOGS PAR BYA DGOS PAS

NYAN THOS KYI LAM, ZHES GSUNGS, LAM SHES GSUM GYI NANG NAS DANG
POR NYAN THOS KYI LAM SHES PA'I LAM SHES 'CHAD PA'I RGYU MTSAN
YOD DE, SKYES BU GSUM GYI LAM NYAMS LEN GYI RIM PA DANG MTHUN
PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR TE, SKYES BU

@026B CHEN PO'I LAM RIM RGYUD LA SKYES PA LA SKYES BU 'BRING
DANG THUN MONG BA'I BLO SBYONG BA DE SNGON DU 'GRO DGOS PA SHES
PAR BYA BA'I PHYIR DU DE LTAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR, GNYIS PA LA, MDO
DE DAG GI DON BSHAD PA'I SGO NAS NYAN THOS KYI LAM SHES PA'I LAM
SHES

BSHAD PA LA, LAM SHES NYID KYI TSUL LA NI, ,ZHES SOGS GSUNGS,
GSUM PA LA SHES PAR BYA BA'I LAM DANG, DE SHES PAR BYED PA'I
TSUL GNYIS LAS, DANG PO LA, KUN NAS NYON MONGS PHYOGS KYI BDEN
PA'I RNAM PA DANG, RNAM BYANG

PHYOGS KYI BDEN PA'I RNAM PA GNYIS LAS, DANG PO LA, SO SO'I RNAM
PA DANG, THUN MONG BA'I RNAM PA GNYIS LAS, DANG PO LA, SDUG BDEN
GYI RNAM PA DANG, KUN 'BYUNG BDEN PA'I RNAM PA GNYIS LAS, DANG
PO NI, MDO LAS, GZUGS NI MI

RTAG PA NYID DU YID LA BYA'O, ,SDUG BSNGAL BA NYID DANG, BDAG
MED PA NYID DANG, ZHI BA NYID DANG, ZHES GSUNGS, DE'I DON 'CHAD
PA LA, DE LA SDUG BSNGAL GYI BDEN PA'I GO RIMS BZHIN DU, MI RTAG
PA DANG, SDUG BSNGAL BA DANG, STONG PA DANG,

BDAG MED PA STE, DE DAG GI MTSAN NYID ZHI BA'I RNAM PA BZHI DAG
DANG, ZHES GSUNGS, GNYIS PA KUN 'BYUNG BDEN PA'I RNAM PA BZHI
STON PA LA, NAD NYID DANG, 'BRAS NYID DANG, ZUG RNGU NYID DANG,
SDIG PA NYID DANG, ZHES GSUNGS, DE'I DON 'CHAD

PA LA; KUN 'BYUNG BA'I BDEN PA'I RGYU DANG, KUN 'BYUNG BA DANG,

@027B PA'I RNAM PA DAG DANG, ZHES GSUNGS, GNYIS PA LAM BDEN GYI
RNAM PA BZHI STON PA LA, BYANG CHEN RNAM MKHYEN DANG LDAN PA'I
SEMS BSKYED PAS DE MI DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS DRAN PA NYE BAR BZHAG
PA BZHI BSGOM MO, ,ZHES PA NAS, MA 'DRES PA

BCO BRGYAD KYI BAR DANG, BYANG CHEN RNAM MKHYEN DANG LDAN PA'I

PHYIN PA LA SPYOD, CES SOGS DANG, YANG BYANG CHEN SHER PHYIN LA
SPYOD PA'I TSE CHOS GANG GI CHOS RNAMS

DANG, YONGS SU RDZOGS PAR BYED PA DANG, YONGS SU BYAS PAR BYED
PA LA SO SOR BRTAGS PAS BDAG MED PA NA CHOS THAMS CAD NI DE TZAM
STE BDAG GAM BDAG GI BA DANG BRAL

BA'O; ;ZHES SOGS DANG, YANG BTZUN PA RAB 'BYOR JI LTAR YONGS SU
BSNGO BA'I SEMS BYANG CHUB KYI SEMS DANG 'GROGS PA MA YIN, JI
LTAR NA BYANG CHUB KYI SEMS YONGS SU BSNGO BA'I SEMS DANG 'GROGS
PA MIN, JI LTAR NA YONGS SU

BSNGO BA'I SEMS BYANG CHUB KYI SEMS LA MED CING MI DMIGS, JI
LTAR NA BYANG CHUB KYI SEMS YONGS SU BSNGO BA'I SEMS LA MED CING
MI DMIGS ZHES DRIS PA'I LAN DU KO'U SHI KA YONGS SU BSNGO BA'I
SEMS GANG YIN PA DE NI

SEMS PA YIN NO ZHES SOGS NAS, BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA GANG YIN PA
DE NI SEMS MA YIN TE SEMS MA YIN PA DE NI SEMS MA YIN PAS YONGS
SU BSNGO BA MED DO, ,KO'U SHI KA 'DI NI BYANG CHEN SHER PHYIN
NO, ,ZHES GSUNGS,

GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS
RNAMS KYI DRUNG NA GNAS PA'I NYAN THOS DE DAG GIS PHA ROL TU
PHYIN PA DRUG LAS GDAMS PA,

ZHES SOGS GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, GNYIS PA LA, MTSAMS SBYAR BA DANG,
RTZA BA DANG, 'GREL PA GSUM LAS, DANG PO NI, 'O NA, NYAN THOS
KYI LAM SHES PA'I LAM SHES KYI 'OG TU DE'I RGYU NGES 'BYED CHA
MTHUN 'CHAD PA'I RGYU MTSAN GANG ZHE NA,

DE'I RGYU MTSAN YOD DE, BDEN BZHI MI RTAG SOGS BCU DRUG MNGON
SUM DU RTOGS PA'I YE SHES NYAN THOS KYI LAM SHES PA'I LAM SHES
DE THOB PA LA, DE'I RGYU NGES 'BYED CHA MTHUN THOB PA SNGON DU
'GRO DGOS PA'I RGYU MTSAN GYIS DE LTAR BSHAD

PA'I PHYIR, ZHES MTSAMS SBYOR BA LA, BDEN PA BZHI YONGS SU SHES
PA NI NGES PAR 'BYED PA'I CHA DANG MTHUN PA RTOGS PA SNGON DU
'GRO BA CAN YIN PAS LAM BRJOD NAS NGES PAR 'BYED PA'I CHA DANG
MTHUN PA, ZHES GSUNGS, GNYIS PA

NI; MDO 'DI'I DON 'CHAD PA'I SGO NAS NYAN THOS KYI LAM SHES PA'I

YOD PA GANG ZHIG ,DE TSE 'PHOS NAS DER 'JUG PA MED PA'I PHYIR

'GREL BSHAD LAS, GANG GIS RGYUN DU ZHUGS PA DANG, PHYIR 'ONG
BA'I 'BRAS BU BSKYED PA LA BDAG NYID

KYIS 'DIR DGRA BCOM PA NYID THOB PAR 'GYUR BA DE DAG NI TSOGS
SHING SPYOD PA YIN LA, ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, LNGA PA LA, THUGS
KYI GNAS PA DANG, SKU'I GNAS PA GNYIS LAS, DANG PO NI, RANG
SANGS RGYAS GSUM GA CHOS ZAB MO LA

MOS PA DANG, RTEN 'BREL ZAB MO LA SO SOR RTOGS PA LHUR LEN PA
DANG, RNAM THAR SGO GSUM YID LA BYED CING GNAS PA YIN NO, ,GNYIS
PA NI, BSE RU LTA BU'I RANG RGYAL GCIG PUR GNAS SHING, TSOGS
SPYOD KYI RANG RGYAL GROGS DANG BCAS TE

GNAS PA YIN NO, ,DRUG PA RANG RGYAL RNAMS GRONG DANG GRONG KHYER
DU RGYU ZHING GNAS PA'I TSE, LUS SHIN TU BSRUNG PA DANG, DBANG
PO RNAMS SHIN TU BSDAMS PA DANG, DRAN PA LA SHIN TU GNAS SHING
GRONG KHYER SOGS SU BSOD SNYOMS LA RGYU ZHING RDZU

'PHRUL BSTAN TE, GDUL BYA RNAMS SMIN GROL LA 'GOD PAR MDZAD DO,
,BDUN PA LA, SPYI'I SGRA BSHAD NI, SLOB DPON GZHAN GYI GDAMS
NGAG LA LTOS MED DU RANG NYID GCIG PU'I DON DU SANGS RGYAS BA
STE, DGRA BCOM PA'I 'BRAS BU THOB PAR

@038B BYED PA'I RGYU MTSAN GYIS RANG SANGS RGYAS ZHES BYA STE,
MDO LAS, LUNG MED PAR BDAG GCIG PU'I PHYIR SANGS RGYAS PAS RANG

GCIG PUR GNAS PAS NA, BSE RU LTA BU ZHES BYA

STE; MDZOD KYI 'GREL BSHAD LAS, BSE RU LTA BU YIN ZHES BYA BA
NI, JI LTAR BSE RU DAG GNYIS MED PA DE BZHIN DU DE DAG KYANG
KHYIM PA DANG RAB TU BYUNG BA RNAMS DANG, RANG SANGS RGYAS GZHAN
DAG DANG MA 'DRES PAR GNAS PAS NA BSE RU LTA

BU RNAMS ZHES BYA'O, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, GROGS DANG LHAN
CIG TU SPYOD PAS NA, TSOGS SHING SPYOD PA ZHES BYA'O, ,GNYIS PA

LAM BGROD TSUL GYI SGO NAS KHYAD PAR

DU 'PHAGS TE, SRID PA THA MA'I TSE SLOB DPON GZHAN GYI GDAMS
NGAG LA MI LTOS PAR 'DOD PA'I RTEN LA RANG GI BYANG CHUB MNGON
DU BYED PAR NGES PA'I GANG ZAG YIN PA'I PHYIR, DE CHOS CAN, NYAN
THOS LAS CHOS STON TSUL GYI SGO NAS

LUS KYI RNAM 'GYUR GYI SGO NAS CHOS STON PAR BYED PA'I PHYIR,
KHO NA RE, TSE PHYI MA DE NYID LA RANG RGYAL DGRA BCOM PA'I
'BRAS BU MNGON DU BYED PAR NGES PA'I SPANG BYA CIG CHAR

BA'I RGYUN ZHUGS CHOS CAN, SBYOR BA SNGA MA LA DER THAL, DE'I
PHYIR TE, SRID PA THA MA'I TSE SLOB DPON GZHAN GYI GDAMS NGAG LA

PA THA MA'I TSE SLOB

DPON GZHAN GYI GDAMS NGAG LA MI LTOS PAR RANG GI BYANG CHUB

BYANG CHUB MNGON DU BYAS PA'I PHYIR ZHES BSTAN PA GNYIS LAS,
DANG PO MI 'THAD DE, GZUGS MED KYI RTEN CAN GYI

@043B SEMS DPA' SANGS RGYAS DANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' MI 'BYUNG
BA'I ZHING DU SEMS CAN GYI DON BYED PA'I BSAM PA DANG LDAN PA'I
SEMS DPA' CHEN PO ZHES BRJOD PA'I PHYIR, RGYAN SNANG LAS, PHYIR
MI LDOG PA ZHES BYA BA NI NGES PAR 'BYED PA'I CHA RTOGS

CHOS STON PA'I SANGS RGYAS MI 'BYUNG BA'I ZHING DU SEMS CAN GYI
DON BYED PA'I BSAM PA DANG LDAN PAS NA

GSUNGS PA'I GNYIS PA DANG, BRGYAD STONG PA NAS GSUNGS PA'I GNYIS
PA DANG, SDUD PA NAS GSUNGS PA'I DANG PO RNAMS GNAS SKABS RANG
RGYAL DU RIGS NGES PA'I RANG RGYAL

ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, DE GSUM GNAS

GYI RIGS CAN RJES SU BZUNG BA'I PHYIR

DU SHES PAR BYA BA'I MNGON RTOGS KYI RIGS SU GNAS PA'I THEG CHEN
'PHAGS PA'I MKHYEN PA, RANG RGYAL GYI LAM SHES PA'I LAM SHES KYI
MTSAN NYID, DE LA DBYE NA GNYIS YOD, SA MTSAMS THEG CHEN GYI
MTHONG LAM NAS SANGS RGYAS KYI

SA'I BAR DU YOD, GNYIS PA GZHUNG DON NI, BYANG SEMS 'PHAGS PA
CHOS CAN, KHYOD KYI SA RANG RGYAL GYI LAM SHES PAR BYED PA'I
TSUL YOD DE, KHYOD KYIS DE SEMS BSKYED BSNGO BA STONG NYID RTOGS
PA'I SHES RAB GSUM GYIS ZIN PA'I SGO

NAS SHES PAR BYED PA'I PHYIR, BSE RU LTA BU'I RANG RGYAL GYI
SGOM LAM CHOS CAN, KHYAD CHOS GSUM DANG LDAN TE, GZUGS PHYI ROL
DON DU 'DZIN PA'I RTOG PA ZAD PAR SPONG NUS, RANG LAM DU SHES PA
LA BDEN PAR 'DZIN PA'I BDEN 'DZIN

DANG LDAN PA'I PHYIR, KHO NA RE, BSE RU LTA BU'I RANG RGYAL GYI
SGOM LAM DES RANG RGYAL GYI RANG BZHIN GNAS RIGS LA BRTEN PAR
THAL, DES RANG RGYAL GYI RIGS LA BRTEN PA'I PHYIR,

BCAS PA'I LHA RNAMS DANG TSANGS PA DANG BCAS PA'I LHA RNAMS DANG
SKYE DGU'I BDAG PO DANG BCAS PA'I LHA RNAMS DANG, SKYES PA BUD
MED DANG BCAS PA DAG GIS LAN GSUM DU

CHED DU BRJOD PA NI 'DI LTA STE, AE MA HO; CHOS RNAMS KYI CHOS
NYID 'DI NI DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I MTHU DANG, ZHES SOGS DANG, BCOM
LDAN 'DAS BDAG GIS KYANG BYANG CHEN SHER PHYIN 'DI DANG MA BRAL
BA DE NI DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA NYID DU GZUNG BAR

BYA'O; ;ZHES SOGS GSUNGS, DE'I DON 'CHAD PA LA, DER GNAS GZUGS
LA SOGS PA LA, ,SANGS RGYAS NYID DU NGES 'DZIN DANG, ,ZHES DANG,
SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA GNAS PA NI CHOS KYI DBYINGS
KYI NGO BO NYID KYIS GZUGS LA SOGS

PA LA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA NYID DU NGES PAR 'DZIN PA DANG, ZHES
GSUNGS, DE YANG MDO'I TSIG ZIN DANG BSTUN NA, GZUGS SOGS DON DAM
PAR MI DMIGS PAR RTOGS PA'I CHOS SHES DER GNAS PA'I BYANG SEMS
KYI PHUNG PO LA GZHAN GYIS

SANGS RGYAS SU BZUNG DU RUNG BA'I PHAN YON BSTAN PA'O, ,KUN
'GYUR RJES BZOD STON PA LA, DE NAS LHA'I BU DE DAG GIS BCOM LDAN
'DAS LA 'DI SKAD CES GSOL TO, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS BYANG CHEN RNAMS
KYI SHER PHYIN 'DI NI GZUGS MI LEN

@050B MING DOR BA'I TSUL DANG, ZHES SOGS GSUNGS, DE'I DON 'CHAD
PA LA, BLANG MED DOR BA MED SOGS DANG, ,ZHES DANG, DE BZHIN DU
DE LA GNAS PA NI CHOS THAMS CAD LA BLANG BA DANG DOR BA MED PA
SGOM PA LA SOGS PA DANG, ZHES GSUNGS,

KUN 'BYUNG RJES SHES STON PA LA, KO'U SHI KA YANG RIGS KYI BU'AM
RIGS KYI BU MO DE DAG LA MI 'AM MI MA YIN PA DAG GLAGS RNYED PAR
MI 'GYUR RO, ,ZHES SOGS DANG, RIGS KYI BU'AM RIGS KYI BU MO DE
DAG GIS MI DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS

SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI DRUNG DU BYAMS PA DANG SNYING RJE DANG
DGA' BA DANG BTANG SNYOMS SHIN TU BSGOMS PA'I PHYIR RO, ,ZHES
SOGS GSUNGS, DE'I DON 'CHAD PA LA, BYAMS LA SOGS DANG, ZHES
DANG, NGO BO NYID MED PAR MOS PA SNGON DU 'GRO BA'I TSAD

MED PA BZHI BSGOM PAR BYA'O, ,ZHES BYA BA DE LTA BU NI KUN
'BYUNG BA'I BDEN PA'I RNAM PA DAG YIN NO, ,ZHES GSUNGS, SKAD CIG
MA BRGYAD PA 'DIR BYAMS SOGS SGOM PAR GSUNGS PA LA DGOS PA YOD
DE, 'DIR SDUG KUN GYI SKYON RDZOGS PAR RIGS

SHING; DGU PAR 'GOG PA'I YON TAN MTHONG BA NA SRID PAR GNAS NAS

BA'I CHED YIN PA'I PHYIR, GSUM PA 'GOG BDEN GYI RNAM PA LA BRTEN
PA'I THEG CHEN GYI MTHONG LAM SHES

CHEN GYI MTHONG LAM LA DBYE NA, THEG CHEN GYI MTHONG LAM MNYAM
GZHAG YE SHES DANG, THEG CHEN GYI MTHONG LAM RJES THOB YE
